title: Excellent on every level
text:
Will be my go to place in NY. Fantastic location, walking distance to grand central, broadway, fifth avenue.
Amazing helpful staff, comfortable rooms. True theres no breakfast but no shortage of those (go to little collins).
Only negative, you need to ask for cleaning service and as we werent told..

title: Otroligt bra värde för pengarna
text:
Det går knappast att få ett mer prisvärt hotell på Manhattan. Mycket trevlig personal, jättebra koncept med bra rum, enkel reception, gemensamt utrymme högst upp. Perfekt läge - jag kommer tillbaka. 

Daglig städning av rum är på begäran vilket har många fördelar. Vill man ha städning och bäddning görs den snabbt och professionellt.

title: Good overall
text:
Excellent staff, friendly and helpful. Comfortable room, albeit a little in the small side, but nicely decorated with a comfortable bed and good shower pressure, the main important things! 

No breakfast on site was a little frustrating, but there are plenty of places nearby.

title: Best location
text: Very nice location, very accessible to the public transport and bus terminals. Also you can walk everywhere you like very safe and nice. Many good foods and shops around and I loved the idea of having water purifiers in each floor with some bottles to use.

title: NYC first timer
text:
This was our first time visit to NYC, and we wanted to stay in midtown that was central, walking distance to major attractions, and close to the subway. This definitely fit our expectations! 

- Central station = 3min walking
- Time square = 15min walking 
- South Central Park = 10min by subway
- Chinatown = 25min by subway
- Upper east side = 20min by subway
- Williamsburg = 30mins by subway
- Brooklyn & Manhattan bridge = 25min by subway
- Battery park = 30min by subway

If you’re a first timer like we were to, need a central location, and are ok with a little noise from city then this is the perfect place for you! ☺️

title: Great location, nice people, good value!
text: Fantastic location close to the beautiful Grand Central station; very nice, welcoming and helpful staff, clean bathroom and comfy sofa-sitting area in room. Really appreciated the welcome gift of snacks, the tasty free coffee on floor 27 looking up to the Chrysler spire! The chilled water points are also an excellent feature. Decent price for the location and no hidden extra costs, definitely a bonus for NYC. Thank you Club Quarters / Boutique, I hope to be back soon!

title: Good price, quality and comfort ratio.
text:
The location of the hotel is prefect for leisurely strolls around NY. The staff is very kind and responsive.
Everything that can be read in the description of the hotel corresponded to reality.
Good value for money, quality and comfort, which made the stay in NY pleasant.

title: Would stay here again!
text:
We had a very comfortable stay in this hotel! 
The location is great. A 5 min walk to Grand Central Station and 10/15 min walk to Times Square. 
Very clean. 
Shower was great.
Most comfortable bed Ive slept in. 

Check in was incredibly easy and quick. 
The staff at reception were friendly and helpful.

title: Great Location and a Nice Experience
text: Came here for business as our office is in the Chrysler building. This hotel has a perfect location. It's maybe a 5-minute walk from Grand Central Station and the Chrysler building and about 15 or maybe 20 minutes from Time Square. In about the same amount of time, you could walk the opposite way to many consolates and the United Nations building. It's clean and provides the right amount of interaction with the staff. The staff was very helpful. Their lounge was very helpful as it's large and comfortable. Our out-of-town team had issues with our badges for our office on the first day so spending time together in the lounge was accommodating. I didn't realize there was a gym. (I also didn't ask to be fair). Otherwise, I would have visited it. For any comic geeks, there's a fun comic store across the street where I got my children some souvenirs. The location is also surrounded by many places to eat. I tried the ramen directly across the hotel for lunch at Oki Poke. The following days for breakfast I tried the Grand Central Station Coffee shop (1-minute walk) which had cool souvenirs, and Little Collins Cafe (get the Green Eggs and Dam! meal). Plenty of delicious places are within delivery distance as well, such as the Lebanese restaurant, Balade.  The bed was comfortable and I was able to find a movie to watch on their TV. Overall it was a very nice experience.

title: Fair
text: The hotel itself is very close to a metro station with a restaurant 200 m away, ideal when you don't want to go far away to eat in the evening....the staff is rather pleasant and smiling, the corridors are clean, the room I have It was comfortable (bath towels, toiletries, etc.) at first glance it was clean but when you pulled out the bed there was a lot of dust and a bottle cap which had not been there for 2 days but rather 1 year! It would therefore be necessary to deepen the cleaning! The price 124€ for a night for 2 people without breakfast of course we are not at the Georges v but a little cleanliness would not be bad! Good for 2/3 nights

title: Fantastic hotel experience in the heart of NY
text: Club Quarter Hotel Grand Central is perfectly located, essential, modern and a super clean hotel, not to mention comfy bed, coffee machine and beautiful bathroom. Especially the friendly staff really made my stay, many thanks! Shall return

title: Not impressed
text: Smallest double hotel room we have ever stayed in. I wish we had took photos of the room, we stayed in a room that was obviously a single and it had had a double bed put in last minute it was tiny. I had to climb and avoid bumping into a wardrobe everytime I needed out of bed. The room had two windows that were tiny. No kettle which isnt an issue but my o/h doesnt drink coffee so for a hot drink every morning I had to wander downstairs. Mice traps under the wardrobe are a classy addition too. Lets just say I wasnt impressed.

title: Great hotel
text: Great hotel, location & experience. Very quick check in and check out. We were helped immediately for both. Convenient location. They aided us with every need we had. Phenomenal view. Wonderful coffee!

title: Great experience.
text: Our stay was wonder. The beds were clean and comfy. The hotel is close to many restaurants and grand central station. There also was a huge bath n body store! The front desk staff were welcoming, helpful and friendly. Check in and out was easy and quick. They even held our bags for is to explore. Though you can park out front to unload, parking  is a bit far. The  only downside is the room  was smaller than expected, however great experience.

title: Highly enjoyed our stay there
text: Great location, most friendly and helpful staff, sure to return in future many times in future. Also great eateries nearby. I look forward to my next stay at this hotel. My home whenever in New York. The rooftop living room rounded off our most superb experience.

title: Great stay
text: Great stay   Comfy clean room   Comfortable pullout couch     Texting room service option was wonderful     Front desk was very helpful    Great lounge on the top floor with a great city view   New espresso machine with different drink options   Lattes, cappuccinos  and streamed milk   Yum

title: Nice hotel, horrible communication
text: I had two separate bookings back to back for the same room type.  I confirmed with the staff when I first booked over a month ago that I could stay in the same room for the duration of both bookings.   I also confirmed upon checkin and on the second day of my trip.  On the third day I was forced to move to another room.  It was a major pain and the end result was a room on a lower floor with no view and no fridge.   This was a huge disappointment and extremely aggravating.

title: Good location and courteous staff
text: Club quarters is very strategically located at the heart of Manhattan and walking distance from Times Square. Very efficient check-in , polite and courteous staff with a lovely spacious lounge at the 27 th floor. Would definitely stay here again during my next visit.

title: Parfait pour une visite à New York !
text: Superbe séjour au Club Quarters Hotel de Grand Central, l'emplacement est top, à quelques pas de la station de train et de métro mais aussi de Times Square et à 20 minutes à pied de Central Park ou de l'Empire State building. Le personnel de l'hôtel est très accueillant et aux petits soins. La chambre était spacieuse, confortable, avec une vue superbe sur les immeubles, une vue très new-yorkaise. Cet hôtel a contribué à rendre mon séjour très agréable.

title: Great stay!
text:
This is our second time staying at Club Quarters and it was equally as wonderful both times!!
My husband had some beverages he wanted to keep cold so he called the front desk asking if there was an ice machine. They asked what he needed ice for and offered to bring a refrigerator up to us - it was brought up to our room right away. The staff is incredibly friendly and professional. The bed was really comfortable. The location is also wonderful as it’s so close to Grand Central! Great stay. Highly recommend!

title: Housekeeping In A Bag
text:
What had been a lovely stay, turned to me asking for housekeeping on day two.  

At 5 PM, I found this on my bed.  (No other changes to the room.)

A bag of towels and a roll of toilet paper!

It is centrally located, mostly quiet, but if you get ‘housekeeping in a bag’ - not cool.

title: Good area bad room
text:
I hated staying there. Location is amazing, but is not a 4 star hotel at all.
100$ for deposit, only card payments for room and deposit.
Rooms are extremely small, no microwave or fridge. 
Check out has to be in person, they even tried to charge me again at check out when I paid fully at the check in.. the room? Horrible stay. The bed right next to a corner couldn’t even move around it or get in and off on one side of it. Only shower, no bath tub and the hot water wasn’t even working.

And what is worst?? The next morning cleaning service starts knocking at 8am so u can get out even if check out is at 12. 
I red it before on the reviews and now I experienced it.

Wont stay there again.

title: Beautiful hotel
text: Limpio, cómodo, buen precio y el cuarto que nos dieron estaba precioso y super cómodo. El proceso de check-in fue muy fácil al igual que el de check out. Personal super amable y el hotel muy bien ubicado.

title: Good experience
text: Good experience. Had good night sleep. Gym is clean. Laundry is clean. Good location. Close to a lot of tourist spot. Close to grand central station. Lots of restaurants around the area. Various thing you can do.

title: I've found a new hotel!
text: I cannot rate this hotel highly enough. My friend and I both chose the smallest rooms (saving $$) so I cannot speak to other experiences but the rooms were spotless. The bed was incredibly comfortable, great big fluffy pillows, and even though the room was small, it had everything I needed (except a mini fridge) and it was so comfortable. The best part of the stay was the staff. Such incredibly nice people, with great attitudes - interacting with them was a pleasure.

title: Convenience on every front
text: The Club Quarters Hotel Grand Central provides excellent access to transportation, postal services, and excellent dining opportunities within an easy walk of the hotel. The top-floor lounge is attractively laid out and inviting. The staff whenever I encountered them was always courteous and helpful.

title: Accommodating to Customers’ Needs
text: The staff were friendly and extremely attentive. Terence Lloyd, Front Office Manager, is wonderful and checked on us throughout our stay to ensure all our needs were met. The kitchenette and living area space were an added bonus. Club Quarter Hotel is conveniently located and offers exceptional customer service.

title: We will be back!
text: This hotel was a very pleasant surprise! When weve stayed at other hotels in nyc, our rooms were always small and noisy. But our room here was big, comfortable and very quite. The beds were very cozy and the room was very clean. The staff was extremely accommodating and friendly. We will definitely stay here again.

title: Perfect for business travel
text: This is a clean and super helpful spot for the weary business traveler.  An incredibly good deal, with laundry facilities, a gym, and great service!  I will stay here whenever in NYC for business.  Haven't found anything else as good.

title: Basic but very nice
text: Nice clean basic hotel; great location. Close to subway. Lots of take out or eat-in options within a walking distance. Good service overall. Highly recommended for a low-maintenance budget traveler!!!

title: A decent value for Manhattan
text:
We stayed at the Club Quarters Gand Central in late January to take advantage of the 24% off hotel week and the 2 Broadway tickets for 1 price during Broadway week.
We had a king on the 23rd floor.  It was clean, quiet, comfortable and relatively spacious for a Manhattan hotel room.  A very decent value.
Liked the excellent location (5 minute walk from Grand Central) friendly staff, fitness room, fast elevators, and the view from our room and the 27th floor lounge.

title: Highly recommend
text: Extremely clean, courteous staff, easily walkable location. We were a bit hesitant because we usually stay more south, but it was easy to get an Uber or take the train. We upgraded to a corner room and our views were incredible, and the cost wasn’t too bad. I highly recommend this place and will definitely be coming back.

title: Serious security concern
text: I am never going to stay here again. On Sunday there was one random guy who entered into my room. On asking the front desk, they said he had the reservation, Which later turned out to be the room in the other hotel in Times Square. This seriously raises concern on the safety. I couldn’t sleep the entire night as I was traumatized. I do not know how did the front desk did not verify the information before handing him a keycard to my room. I later asked them to change my key cards but such a negligence is never heard off. I have never experienced this in any hotel I have stayed ever. I also know that this experience will not even be reviewed and will be dumped aside.

title: La estadía perfecta
text: El hotel es excelente, y su ubicación es lo mejor. Está cerca de muchos lugares a visitar, la estación del tren súper cerca para moverte por todo New York, el personal, las habitación también son excelentes. Me gustó mucho la estación de agua y el café en el cuarto.

title: Bookmarking this hotel
text:
A terrific hotel, steps from Grand Central. The staff was so courteous and helpful--even the maintenance workers offered us a 'hello' and 'have a great day'. 
The room was very clean and the bed and pillows were quite comfortable. You could control the temp in your room which I appreciate. It was pretty quiet too, even on the 4th floor. 
The location is great--easy access to the subways, an easy walk to Bryant Park and elsewhere. The nearby Chrysler building is a great landmark in case you lose your bearings. Coffee is only 150 feet away at Dunkin Donuts. 
Definitely a very good choice for your NYC stay.

title: Excellent and professional staff
text: The staff made checking in easy and were accommodating offering us a larger room on a lower floor as I am scared of heights. They were prompt when we texted a request for extra blankets. They made checking out easy with their kiosk system.

title: Fantastic Stay
text: Our stay was wonderful!  The hotel was clean and the rooms quite spacious especially in NY. The beds were comfortable and the views from every one of our rooms was terrific. The lounge was super nice and we were able to utilize it even after checkout. It was a truly great stay.

title: Très bien
text: Nous avons passé un séjour fantastique. Hôtel très bien placé pour visiter New York. Métro à proximité et à 15 mn à pieds de Time square. Personnel très agréable et à notre écoute. Je le recommande. Et n'hésiterai pas à y retourner.

title: Excellent location, but poor customer service
text: The location is great (walking distance to Grand Central, Bryant Park, Times Square) and our room at the 5th floor was very clean, comfortable and quiet, but the staff at check in should take the time to inform guests that - despite what you will find online- there’s no breakfast (not even with a fee), no restaurant (it closed 2 years ago), no wine and snacks in the lounge/terrace, and not even tea or coffee since the machine is currently broken! However, there’s a gym (3rd floor), free laundry, free water and the yoga mat was indeed in our closet. Cleaning service is every 3 days. I stayed in other CQ hotels in the past, this one is below the usual standards.

title: Perfect location and price!
text: We booked this hotel over the new year period and couldn’t be happier with the price and location. The rooms were clean and tidy, decent size bathroom with great water pressure. It’s nothing amazingly fancy but everything is up to scratch as you would want with a hotel. The location made it a great spot for travellers as we were walking distance to a lot of things and if we did need the subway it was a 2 minute walk to grand central. Definitely would stay here again

title: Great hotel
text: Great experience! In the middle of everything, waking distance to the subway. Rooms spotless, friendly staff. My new place everytime I come to the city! Higly recommended it! Plus the price was excellent! And the most important! Very quiet!

title: A stones throw from grand Central
text: Great value with an ideal proximity to Grand Central Terminal for anyone traveling via MTA.  Entrance and lobby felt crammed as well as our room, however very clean and suitable for a ONE-TWO night stay.

title: Excellent service, clean room and easy check in process
text: Wonderful service, clean room and easy check in & check out process. I have stayed at this hotel for 4 of my trips to NYC and have always received excellent service, this last time I was injured (I checked in after leaving the emergency room) and the staff, Mark Anthony in particular was amazing even better service than in my past stays. I truly appreciated the extra care, thank you & I will definately be back soon.

title: Perfect Stay in the heart of Manhattan
text: The hotel was In very convenient location. The staff extremely helpful which make out stay even better. The room was very comfortable and especially the mattress was very very nice. It was very soft ft and I would prefer to take it with me . I searched to see the brand but there was no laber .

title: Where's the coffee?
text: Not enough coffee in room, no coffee in lounge.  Asked for light housekeeping, received none.  Came in staff friendly. Room good size and value.  Tv did not stream.  Rooms were very clean, and nice sheets, nice couch.

title: Perfect location for exploring NYC
text: This hotel is in the perfect location for accessing all tourist attractions of New York. We travelled from JFK to Grand Central and this hotel is only a few mins walk away. The room was basic in that it had a private bathroom bed and tv etc but it was perfect for what you need after a long day of exploring the city. The room was clean and staff were welcoming at reception. We had no issues at all.

title: Amazing Stay!
text: It's location to Grand Central and Times Square is ideal. Clean and modern. The water bottle service is a great extra especially if you're planning on walking in the city. Easy check in & out. Overall a perfect stay

title: nice location, clean rooms
text: nice hotel for the cost. good location, clean. Staff was nice. Nothing overly special but the access to Grand Central was nice. It was good for a December trip with friends. There isn't a restaurant in the hotel or a bar. The Tv would never work. But overall decent.

title: Great location; Basic hotel
text:
Great location near Grand Central station. Crazy expensive in mid-December. Great beds. Quiet. Clean room. Nice spot on the 27th floor where people work during the day. Checkin and out were quick with self-service kiosks.  We checked luggage very efficiently l.The lobby was basically one small room without furniture. 
Downsides:
- virtually no amenities
- terrible shower
- coffeemaker on 27th floor wasn’t working either day we were there. Evidently, they have no maintenance people on staff

title: Gem of a Hotel
text:
What a great little hotel, we travelled as a family of 4 with children 14 & 17, we booked two twin rooms, the rooms are on the small side, but have everything you need and are fairly modern and clean.

The hotel is in a great location 1 minute from grand central station, 15 minute walk from Central Park and time Square and only 5 minutes from 5th avenue shops.

The front of house staff and amazing, friendly and always ready to offer help and advice.

Myself and family would definitely stay here again

title: Great location, great staff
text:
Great location but it's the staff make it. Actually stayed with me and walked to the corner trying to hail a taxi on a very busy Saturday night. I can say that certainly go above and beyond to help.
Highly recommend.

title: Great Hotel Great Experience
text: Great hotel with great midtown location. Very European vibe. Front desk staff go above and beyond to provide assistance. Very accommodating. Have visited Club Quarters down town and in London and it’s always a good experience. Would recommend and would stay with them again.

title: Clean, quiet, affordable
text: A block away from Grand Central, affordable, quiet and clean. It is a great choice for a commuter. Kiosk check in was easy, DIY key set up, and helpful staff made my check in simple. Yes, the room was small (it’s NYC) but clean. The bathroom was perfect for me. Very comfortable bed with soft linens. I’m a commuter and stay overnight occasionally. I will return.

title: Amazing location!
text: This hotel was close to everything. Grand Central Terminal just around the corner. Short walk to the Chrysler building, Rockefeller Center, Saks 5th Avenue, and other shopping. You will love it here. Planning another trip already!

title: Club Quarters Stay
text: I will start by saying, "Every staff member we encountered was extremely nice and helpful." The location of the hotel was great.  We walked most places during our visit.  I would most definitely stay again.

title: Fabulous property.
text: LOVED our stay here! The location is perfect, just a few blocks from Grand Central. The hotel is clean and well appointed. Staff was all friendly and helpful. The free water bottles are an awesome bonus. Can’t wait for our next stay!

title: Hidden Gem in Midtown
text: Perfect location. Close to Grand Central, and Vanderbilt. Easy to get around midtown. Plenty of options of restaurants in the area. Comfy bed. Clean room. To top it off the staff is wonderful . Definitely going back when in NY again.

title: Clean and Great Value Hotel with Central Location in NYC!
text:
Was looking for an affordable, clean hotel that had a central location in NYC. Was considering a lot of other hotels but reviews noted that the the those other hotels were not clean and outdated. 

I came across Club Quarters Grand Central which had reviews saying it was clean, which was of utmost importance to me and held true to our own room. The value for the stay was excellent considering it being close to the subway and not too far of a walk from Port Authority Bus Terminal and Times Square since we were busing in from New Jersey. 

I appreciated our room having a table and sit down area to eat (there’s a 99 cent pizza place just a 1 min walk away to bring a box to your room!). Also was surprised the room came with a mini fridge. I also really appreciated the filtered water station just by the elevators on our floor, which they also provided empty plastic bottles for you to fill to bring during your NYC adventures!

The cherry on top were the beautiful views overlooking downtown and the Chrysler Building from the lounge on the 27th floor, where they had complimentary coffee from the automated machine and tea.

title: Amazing
text: The room as far as the view of the city , the atmosphere, train station location, and the services was on point. Amazed at the one bedroom suite with the mini stove top and fridge along with the microwave oven!!

title: Great staff, they were very friendly, very adequate rooms for fee in NY, excellent walkability and subway availability!!
text: Great staff!! Very concierge like. They all get to know you entering and exiting the Bldg. Very helpful and anticipate your need for help before you even ask!! Location is ideal for walking and use of subway!! Room was very adequate for the price in comparison to other hotels costs in NY. Would highly recommend to those not needing a 5 star hotel, but a nice place to sleep, shower, change and head out for the day and evening. Very clean and very comfortable beds. We were in a standard King bed room. Had a unique table and built in seating bench, should you want to stay in and play cards or order in eats.

title: Excellent Location and Hotel Was Very Nice
text: This hotel was very clean.  The location was excellent.  It was close to Bryant Park, Grand Central and all the trains on the Eastside.  I would definitely stay here again.  In fact, I signed up for the rewards.

title: Incredible getaway
text: I had a remarkable stay at this New York City hotel, offering an exceptional terrace with stunning city views and a prime location near Grand Central Station and various tourist attractions. The convenience of exploring the city on foot or by subway, combined with the attentive service and comfortable rooms, made my visit truly memorable. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking to experience the best of New York.

title: AMAZING hotel 🤩
text: Safe location, room size is FANTASTIC if traveling with family, clean and updated. The front desk staff was friendly and helpfull. I fully RECOMMEND to anyone - and I’m a very picky traveler!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Have patience
text: Very small lobby and check in area that warrants more structure to avoid crowding, rude behavior by other travelers, and delays in and out. He lobby staff seem a bit overwhelmed with the number of people checking in.

title: Great location and friendly stay
text: We had a wonderful stay at Club Quarters Boutique Hotel Grand Central with a number of other couples. Our room was clean and had everything we needed. The rooftop terrace/lounge gave us a great place to meet with the other couples we were travelling with, and the free, specialty coffees were a definite bonus! Most of all the friendly, personable staff made us feel right at home. In particular, Manny at the front desk made us feel taken care of and like we were staying with friends. Thanks so much for a wonderful stay.

title: NYC City Visit
text: The front desk staff was OUTSTANDING-helpful,  friendly,  and courteous! My room was extremely clean, LOVED the bed and pillows. Conveniently located to Grand Central Station! Definitely recommend it!

title: Superb stay. Club Quaters is first class with stellar service!
text: A fantastic stay. A modern, clean and vibrant hotel. The rooms are warm and spacious. The bed one of the best I have slept in. The coffee lounge on the 27th floor was great. Great central location. Highly recommend!

title: Excelente
text: Este hotel boutique es perfecto! Ubicación inmejorable,  a pasos de la mítica Grand Central Station. La habitación muy cómoda con todo lo necesario. Buen somier, buenas almohadas,  cafetera (cápsulas) en la habitación. Y la comodidad de tener un dispenser de agua potable en cada piso, con botellas para servirse libremente.  Así como también en el último piso, una zona para estar, con café, durante las 24h. Una terraza para pasar un rato, y sillones para comer algo que compremos de afuera, o simplemente disfrutar el rato. El personal super amable y gentil. La recepción muy sencilla en el check in y check out. Muy recomendable!!!

title: An excellent hotel in an excellent location.
text:
This hotel is in an ideal location 2 minutes from Grand Central Terminal. The room was very spacious and clean, the beds were very comfortable. The staff were all very helpful and the tea and coffee on 27th floor were very convenient. 
We would definitely stay there again and would highly recommend it.

title: Picked the right hotel in NYC!
text: We had an enjoyable stay at Club Quarters Hotel Grand Central in NYC. The staff were friendly throughout, the room was spacious with 2 rooms (king-size bed and sofa bed) and a great corner view overlooking E 45th St and Lexington Avenue, which most hotels would charge a premium for! The king-size bed was super comfy, too. There's a comfortable lounge on the 27th-floor serving complimentary hot drinks and an outdoor patio area with great views to enjoy your morning coffee!

title: Location is good. Hotel is a so so
text: When staying at this hotel you have to be cautious and vigilant with the hotel invoice. I was charged with early check-in when I didn’t even requested for it. I arrived at the hotel around 10am and asked if I can leave my luggage while I roam the city and wait for the check-in. The concierge said “oh your room is ready” and of course I was like wow thank you and thought to myself that was a nice touch/service. BUT it was actually charged and was billed for early check-in, which I don’t mind paying but the concierge should be upfront that it is chargeable and not just say “your room is ready!”. Aside from that, the invoice is so confusing plus conversation from USD to SGD is such a pain in the ass that I just let go of different room rates for every night. Not sure if this is booking.com problem or the hotel but Im just not really happy with my 6nights stay with this hotel. Badly maintained room. Imagine my bed has a massive curve around the middle part, it seems like an elephant slept there for a while.

title: perfect hotel in NYC
text:
The location of the hotel is perfect for public transportation and for walking every where. The hotel is clean, rooms are nice, all the services are very good (wi-fi for ex)
The staff is amazing!!!!!!

title: Just book it.
text: This hotel exceeded on my expectations! The living area and terrace were phenomenal - and the unlimited free coffee was next level. It was a fabulous location too. The rooms were clean and the bed was very comfy. I will definitely stay here again!

title: Excellent centrally located hotel
text:
The entrance of the hotel may not be grand or imposing but what an impressive hotel! From arrival, everything about the experience was unique. The reception is not your usual stodgy hotel format. The friendly attendants helped me check in at the kiosks. Incredibly, my room was available super early and I was quickly able to go upstairs.  By far, the most efficient self service check in I have ever experienced. 

The room itself was incredibly spacious, given my normal matchbox experience of Manhattan hotels. 

Super comfortable bed, hot showers and full size bath amenities. What a treat!

Highly recommended

title: A great location to explore NYC 🗽🍎❤️
text:
Me and my wife stayed for 4 nights in September. After a long flight from Manchester we were greeted by friendly staff, who made our check in really easy. 

The free coffee and water is a great touch and the rooftop terrace is a perfect place to enjoy a coffee in the morning. 

Rooms are small but more than enough room to be comfortable. 

The best thing about the hotel though is without doubt the location. A few minutes from Grand Central station, Summit and Times Square. 

Real value for money and we would definitely stay again.

title: Terrible experiencia
text: Nos robaron el I pad dentro de la habitación, el hotel carece de caja fuerte, el personal del hotel muy grosero y altanero en especial Marc, sin darnos ninguna solución ni disculpa,  se limitaban a decir, estamos investigando y se contactarán con ustedes, salimos el 2 de Oct, y es hora que no nos contactan.

title: Hotel vicinissimo al centro con godibile terrazza al 27° piano
text:
Sono stata in questo hotel per una settimana e mi sono trovata molto bene. La camera ha uno stile un po’ datato e per terra c’è la moquette, ma è spaziosa e il letto è comodo. Nell’armadio ci sono anche asse e ferro da stiro, cosa che non ho mai trovato in Italia, neppure negli hotel più stellati
La posizione è strategica: a due passi dalla stazione Grand Central e dalla metro, e comunque vicina alle principali attrazioni, tutte raggiungibili anche a piedi.
Il personale è gentile e disponibile ma il vero punto di forza per me è stata la terrazza al 27 º piano, dove ho visto molte persone fare Smart working… io ci andavo per  fare colazione dato che c’è un distributore di bevande calde a disposizione della clientela, e a prendere il caffè dopo pranzo.
Ad ogni piano ci sono gli erogatori di acqua con delle comode borracce in plastica da riempire.
Le pulizie vengono fatte su richiesta per motivi ecologici  e per me non è stato un problema rifarmi il letto qualche mattina. Quando ne  ho avuto bisogno, sono state prontamente effettuate a semplice richiesta alla reception
La mia esperienza è stata positiva

title: A very good hotel in a good location
text: We were very pleased with the appearance of the hotel from the outside. The courtyard of the hotel we were at the night before was filled with homeless people and was less than inviting. We also appreciated the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff, who gave us recommendations for dinner and breakfast the next morning. Unlike the last hotel, the room had two chairs, so both of us could sit in a chair at the same time. The bed was very comfortable, with enough pillows. The only drawback was the AC, which was incredibly noisy. My husband told them about it and they immediately sent someone up, but we were about to check out. Still, we appreciated the effort. This is a place we'd be happy to go back to.

title: Good spot !
text: Great location ! Clean room and easy check in process! Would def return here.  Perfect for a quick stay w a friend we had a quiet size room and enjoyed it.  Very close to grand central too! Thanks for having us

title: Noxious smell
text: There was a small of gasoline on every floor and in the elevators that they claimed they didn’t know the root cause of. Later they said it was due to paint. I lived in NYC for 5 years, I know smells. This was gasoline or some derivative and very potent. It was enough to make me light headed and have a headache in a very short time. Immediately checked out because no remedy was provided.

title: Never again
text:
I paid over USD 1600 for a 4 night stay at the club quarters. The room smelled awful (stale smoke) but was otherwise comfortable enough if a little yellowed and dated. The coffee machine was also not working. However the conduct of the front desk manger was appalling. Unhelpful, arrogant and dismissive he did nothing to resolve a double billing issue that I brought to his attention, even after showing the double charge which put my checking account into overdraft. He immediately put the onus back on me to sort out when the charge had clearly been made twice by the hotel at check-in (once recorded as cancelled but not actually cancelled) All this after refusing to charge the room to my corporate card in the first place. This charge is still unresolved at the time of writing.
So a combination of very poor value for money, an average room and the dreadful conduct of one staff member means an absolute no from me.

title: Several disappointments
text:
I just checked in and I am very disappointed with CQ.

1. They charged the first night early morning, before arriving to the property. Never seem this. Ok if there is a no show it will be charged, but no so soon.

2. Arrived 11:30 AM, they had available rooms, as long as you pay a 50 USD charge. That is a novelty for me.

3. No safe at the room. They call themselves a boutique hotel, but there is no safe or fridge at the room.

I have stayed  in several NY hotels, know that this is a tough market for travelers. Will avoid CQ on my next trips.

title: Terrible from A-Z
text: Spent 7 nights here in September 2023: This hotel is super expensive for little value. I have been in Motel 6, Ibis and BW that all have cost less than 10% compared to the price paid for this hotel with bigger and better rooms. Cleaning is done only when you request it, so you always have to call. No breakfast is available/included. They do not even put water bottles in the room for this crazy price. Staff is quite rude, some of them even nasty. I have never stayed in a place so expensive … with no value for it. Cleaning clothes is super expensive and you pay for ironing, but the clothes were not ironed. So had to iron them myself! All in all very unhappy here, not worth more than 100 USD per night, but that just because of the location. There is no reception, just a tiny chaotic room where you don’t feel welcome. No one cares. Total abuse here!

title: OK
text: Great room, but expensive.  Did not use room service as stay was 4 nights.  Lobby is sparse.  No bar or restaurant in Hotel, but these services are right across the street.  Right by Grand Central so easy commute if coming from suburbs

title: Jederzeit gerne wieder..
text: Tolle Lage. Unser Zimmer im 25. Stock war super. Alles sauber, gut ausgestattet, bequemes Bett. Etwas klein, aber absolut ausreichend für 3 Nächte. Das Personal war freundlich. In jeder Etage gab es kostenlose Wasserspender. Und im 27. Stock eine Terrasse mit tollem Ausblick und Kaffee/Tee/Wasser so viel man wollte. Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit unserem Aufenthalt.

title: Quick Business Trip
text: Needed a conveniently located and comfortable place to stay last minute for an extended work trip. This hotel fit all my needs. It was simple clean quiet and comfortable. Would definitely recommend this to a friend or associate.

title: Provide the room advertised please, just once, please
text: Another trip to NYC (The second in a week) where the room received was not as advertised. What is it so hard? I would love to see the room that is part of the advertised room for a Club Room as it was not the one I got put into.

title: Exceptional stay
text: Despite some recent poor reviews, my partner and I just stayed at this hotel and we haven’t a bad thing to say. The room was exceptional, clean, well equipped and laid out. Our greeting at reception by the staff was warm and friendly. Floor 27 indoor and terrace area was impressive too. A huge working/office space and the terrace has great views of the surrounding city. Highly recommend staying here and we will certainly be back in the future.

title: solo weekend stay for two nights
text: Very quiet; on the 19th floor away from the street. Room was not big but I didn't expect it to be. Very clean and practically appointed with features I prefer-- well lit; access to light from the bed; magnified bathroom mirror; good water pressure in shower with handheld fixture. Staff were all polite and helpful. No charge to store luggage which was a nice courtesy. I would stay again. Much better than I expected.

title: The perfect place to stay in NYC
text: The perfect stay. I have been in NYC maybe 15 times, have never repeat a hotel since could not find the perfect one for me until now. Location, 2 blocks from Subway and Grand Central with lots of options for dinning, 3 blocks from  5ht av, 15 minutes walk to Times sq. I managed to walk everywhere from there: Tims sq, Port authority and very convenient to go to US OPEN and walk only 5 minutes from subway to your bed at 2 am after an exhausting day at the Open.  Staff very friendly, great facilities and a spectacultar terrace where you can have a cup of coffe, a couple of beers or simply admire the wonderful view. I am definitively going back.

title: Absolutely will stay again!
text: Incredible location, friendly staff, rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable. I love the refillable water bottles on every floor, so convenient! For its location and the amenities offered, Club Quarters Grand Central often provides good value for money, especially for business travelers who appreciate the convenience and efficiency.

title: Never Again!
text:
The hotel was nothing as it was advertised. It was Not spacious, there was little to no access for a lobby setting. Not one staff member stated where the gym, lobby, or club level was located despite asking many times. The bed was incredibly uncomfortable and the fact there was no safe or mini fridge for a Business Setting room was astonishing!

I was alone and needed help with bags - no one to assist. I was told to simply get a bag cart and carry it up alone to my room. It was prime time Friday on a major holiday weekend at 7pm, and yet not one person who worked there came to assist! I was pissed immediately, and if I could have received a refund and found another hotel I would have done so immediately. However, my go to hotel, which is literally just a block over, but I thought try something new and go with this option as it is based upon the recommendation of multiple positive reviews. I also found it incredibly deceiving that I receive an email asking if I want to upgrade 24hrs earlier and I solely need to ask upon check-in and then told to meet a kiosk (not even a human individual) and the one person who did chat with stated please check in on the kiosk terminal and there are no upgrades. I was then advised that the email granting an upgrade for $78 must be clerical error as the hotel is sold out!

title: Horrible check in process
text: Horrible check in process. Room was not ready when promised and we were told that our room will be ready “soon”. Three hours later it still wasn’t ready and we had to go ask multiple times if the room was ready. Was told a “system error” occurred and our room was never assigned. Was also promised that a note would be left on our reservation to compensate us when we check out, however there was no such note and we paid full price. Overall bad experience with customer service and we will not be returning

title: Fantastic Weekend Getaway
text: I stayed at the Club Quarters Hotel Grand Central for the weekend to spend time in Times Square.  The room was very cozy and quiet. The bed was comfortable and everything was clean. I checked in and out fast and easy. I felt safe and the hotel crew was very accommodating. I had a fantastic weekend, going to Broadway shows, movies, etc., and everything was in close proximity. I will definitely do this all over again.

title: Booked a superior room, but none was available when we checked in - and the same thing happened to our friends!!
text: The hotel is clean. The room we got was quite small, but pretty well designed and clean. But very small.   No luggage rack. We asked for a microwave and refrigerator to be delivered, and they said they would do this, but never did. The best thing about the hotel is the rooftop area with free coffee/tea/cappuccino, indoor/outdoor seating.

title: Housekeeping issues
text: Great Location. The cleaning of the room is upon request, one should know that before booking. Although. the request was put in on the second day, It took 4 days before getting the room cleaned. One should also know that the "goodies" that used to be present on the top floor are not there anymore-

title: Soggiorno perfetto al club quarters hotel grand central, new york
text:
Soggiorno a dir poco perfetto!
Hotel pulito, personale disponibile e simpatico!
Centralissimo a 15 minuti a piedi da times square, ottima vista sulla città e molto silenziosa e sicura come zona!!
All’ultimo piano una macchina del caffè con un sacco di scelte disponibili GRATIS e una bellissima terrazza dove passare del tempo e godersi il panorama!
Acqua GRATIS!
Al terzo piano una palestra con l’essenziale per allenarsi e due lavatrici e asciugatrici!!
Che dire, ci tornerò sicuramente per le vacanze di natale!!!

title: Wonderful time
text: Hotel was nice friendly, and the room was amazing. The staff member helping us check in even recommended some stuff in the area for us to check out. It was in a good location making traveling to very easy. Can't wait to go back.

title: Great experience
text: We had a great experience here. Hotel is perfectly situated in the city and for an amazing price! Slept sooo well, comfortable beds, clean and nice bathrooms. Relatively small rooms but it was big enough for us. Staff was so kind and helpful, gave us lots of advice for avoiding traffic, parking and getting around the city. Free cold water in each floor was super useful. And amazing lounge area on the top floor with nice furniture and free coffee! Honestly had such a great experience in New York because of this hotel. Highly recommend

title: Highly recommended
text: Great hotel. Just minutes to Grand Central Station. Rooms with coffee machine, microwave and fridge. It has a terrace where you can enjoy the views with free coffee or tea. In each floor they have a machine with free water and bottles. Viktor, Marco Antonio and Julio great professional and really kind. I highly recommed this hotel.

title: No TV and no hot water
text:
This hotel is very convenient to 2 grand central office building so stay when we have investor meetings.  

This trip - 2 issues.  

TV remote not functional and the prior guest had the same issue as they unplugged the TV otherwise no way to turn off.  Was told I had to wait until the next day to get a remote snd morning of check out - no hot water at 4:00 sm in the morning when leaving for airport.  Hotel rates are reasonable and location great.  Minimum service hotel.

title: Double room
text: A very nice and clean, good value for money hotel. Easy to reach, Penn Street station is only a 25 minute walk away on 31st street. With easy cheap train travel to Newark airport for 15 dollars each on the NY Line. EWR railway, just 3 stops away.

title: Club Quarters Hotel - Grand Central - Top Notch!
text: We have stayed at Club Quarters Hotel before and the experience both times have been awesome.  The location is walking distance to Time Square and Broadway.  The Front Desk is efficient, professional and friendly. The rooms are very clean.  The bed is really comfortable.  In addition to everything, the best part of the hotel is the lounge at the top of the building.  The coffee machine is the best.  The area is really comfortable, and there is an outside deck with a view of the Chrysler Building.  We will continue staying at this hotel for future visits.  There is no reason to stay in any other hotel.

title: Great stay
text: Great location for being a tourist! Easy walking distance to many sights and places. Staff friendly and helpful at check in and check out (I tried the kiosk and i was the problem!!) The hotel clean, the room was a decent size for a solo traveller. Coffee good in the lounge too. Perfect stay.

title: Good value centrally located hotel with excellent service
text: Excellently located hotel, close of plenty of cafes and bars. Good for both a family weekend, as it well located for tourist attractions and for business guests, as it had good wifi and a desk in the room. The rooms was clean, comfortable also had a fridge and microwave. Excellent service and the bonus of a terrace on the 27th floor with a business lounge with free coffee/tea.

title: A hotel with a heart!
text: I stayed at Club Quarters due to my daughter having a second open heart surgery in 8 years.  The hotel is clean, comfortable and wonderful.  The staff are amazing and became a sort of family when I was vulnerable and fearful for my daughter’s life.  I cannot say enough.  I would come back under any circumstances.

title: Perfect position
text: Nice hotel and the self service caffetteria on the balcony is really nice and usefull!!.You need to ask for house keeping every morning before 10.30 so it’s a little bit annoying.water dispencer are free and check in and check out are done with an iPad

title: Clean and comfortable for adults
text: I stayed one night with my 2-year-old while visiting friends who were in Midtown.  My son used an inflatable toddler mattress while there, which we managed to fit in the queen room by rearranging the chairs around the table to the foot of the bed (the table was bolted to the ground).  If there had been another adult staying in the room, it would have made getting in and out of bed very difficult.  There was also no refrigerator for my son's milk and the two ice machines in the building are on the 3rd and 27th floors. The room was clean and spacious enough for one or two adults, but it is not ideal for a baby or young children.  I appreciated there were not a ton of things I needed to move in order to toddler-proof.  The area doesn't have much for kids either (to be expected), but good options are the children's library or carousel at Bryant Park.

title: The Place to Stay in NYC
text:
We stay at Club Quarters Grand Central regularly.

There is a great staff at a fantastic location with affordable prices.

A native New Yorker by birth, we are returning in September and December, recommend CQGC highly and enthusiastically.

title: New York New York!!!
text: Nous avons séjourné le temps d’un week-end au club quaters  hôtel avec mon mari. Tout était très bien. L’hôtel est très bien situé. À quelques rues de Maddison square. À pied ça se fait très bien. L’hôtel était très propre et accueillant. À notre arrivée malgré très tard, le personnel présent au lobby nous a très bien accueilli. Il nous a guidé afin que nous fassions  notre check in seul. La chambre était très propre. L’idée d’avoir un distributeur d’eau sur chaque étage est fabuleux. Surtout avec la chaleur de l’été. La terrasse et lounge au 27ieme étage est un bel atout à l’hôtel! La machine à café complète aussi au 27 ieme est géniale. Que se soit pour du lait chaud ou du café, latté, expresso et j’en passe! Le service de garder nos bagages après le check out pour nous était très pratique car nous n’avions pas à traîner le tout avec nous dans la ville durant nos derniers magasinages en attendant de partir pour l’aéroport. Le personnel que j’ai eu a rencontrer étaient tous chaleureux. Dans l’ensemble j’ai vraiment apprécié. Cela faisait différent d’un hôtel que j’étais à Manhattan aussi deux semaines de cela. J’y retournerai sans hésiter au club quaters grand central.

title: Pleasantly Surprised
text: Loved the location.  Not close to the craziness of Time Square but near subway to take you places.  Close to two coffee places and a cute little breakfast place.  Check in was rough but room was what I paid for.  Staff was super nice and loved the terrace on the 27th floor.  Felt super safe.  Would stay again.

title: Great central and very clean midtown hotel
text: Great very clean hotel right in Manhattan- very comfy beds and very clean and well working bathroom- highlight is the open air terrace with great views and a free coffee machine with excellent capuchino in the attached indoor club room as well as the friendly staff- great value!

title: Really great hotel in terms of location, cleanliness and friendly staff
text: Good value hotel very close to Grand central , extremely helpful staff, clean rooms with very comfy beds, very quiet with fresh water available on all floors which was a nice extra. Roof terrace is also a nice extra as you can take own food and drink up, with water/tea/coffee freely available. We walked a lot straight from the hotel - with Times Square 15 min walk, Hudson yards 30 mins, Empire State Building 10 mins, west village 40 mins. Tube at Grand central is a 3 min walk for sites further away.  I would return as whilst it’s not huge, it was perfect for us in terms of budget, location, quality and service.

title: Very noisy.
text: Poor insulation and too much noise coming from the street, making it hard to sleep at night. The hotel needs a deep renewal. Good location, right in the middle of Manhatan. Too expensive for the service recieved.

title: Comfy bed, but poor value for money
text:
We arrived quite late on the day, and check-in was smooth. However the interior and exterior was quite dated, and there was no cafe or restaurant on site, neither it offers coffee or tea or water in the room. 
The bed and pillows are comfortable which is excellent. However, the internet connection was a hit-and-Miss, depending on where you located in the room. Connection is vital to work communication and it was not to my expectation for paying a high room rate and not receiving a stable wifi connection. 
Overall, this will be my last time to experience CQ, as it is more of a Airbnb type of basic stay rather than a hotel.

title: Excellent hotel near metro with very good features.
text: Very good service. The room comfortable. Water available at all floors  and ice with coffee and tea at top floor. Room service once needed excellent. Problem with charging solved quickly by person in reception both at check in and check out.

title: Highly recommended
text:
This hotel exceeded my expectations.
Check in was quick and easy. I checked in at the front desk, rather than using the machines. The lobby area is small but never felt overcrowded.
My room was clean and comfortable. I had the added bonus of a fridge, microwave and a table and chair which was unexpected and really helpful for bringing back food for the week.
The bathroom was spacious, clean and had all of the amenities.
Room cleaning process was made very clear to me on check in.
The lounge on the 27th floor is priceless. Great seating indoors and outside. I didn't try the coffee, but I had lots of cups of tea up there! Having water machines on each floor is a money saver and something I think all hotels should offer.
Check out was smooth, with staff allowing me to store my bags and then use the lounge in the afternoon to chill before my flight.
My room was quite noisy from the street but this was expected from the location just outside Grand Central Terminal.
As a young (ish!) solo female traveller, I felt safe at all times at this hotel.
I would recommend this hotel for business and leisure travellers alike. It was perfect!

title: Outstanding experience!
text:
I felt extremely fortunate to find Club Quarters, especially with its reasonable price. I'm one of the hundreds stuck in NYC, due to two days of flight cancellations at LaGuardia. I loved checking myself in and was delighted to discover my sweet room. It was tiny, but so well put-together and lacked nothing! I would compare it to a well-designed RV.
The only thing I missed was being able to see out of the windows, but I suspect there was no view, and that's why the windows are "frosted." 5 stars from me!

title: Precisely what you want in Manhattan! Club Quarters has perfected the art of hospitality!
text: Extraordinary experience!  Club Quarters Hotel Grand Central has perfected the art of hospitality. The rooms are designed for maximum comfort, with  heavenly beds, high-end electronics; everything is brilliantly streamlined .... perfect for work as well as relaxing. The beds are fantastic. The shower is heaven. The hotel is precisely what you want in Manhattan. Nothing is left to chance. The staff was perfect. I look forward to returning.

title: Great stay
text: I was extremely satisfied with my experience staying at Club Quarters GrandCentral. The room wasn’t small and it was very clean and had all the necessities. The bad was very comfortable. The main advice of the hotel is its central location. It is located near a lot of main attractions of Manhattan with an easy access to public transit. I would definitely stay at this hotel again. Highly recommend!

title: Not fancy but really nice
text:
I booked this hotel via Hopper and was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable my room was. Yes, it was small but not poky. I loved the toiletries provided and the fact that they were in big bottles instead of those throwaway little ones. Yes, you don’t get to take them home but it’s so much better for the planet. 

I loved that the shower was handheld and there was even a bench in the shower to make it wheelchair friendly. 

Perhaps my favourite moment was when I asked if I could have access to a microwave oven to warm up my Uber Eats - they don’t have one in coffee lounge. The staff sent one to my room! That was really special. 

I went to one of the Hyatts (in KTown) and was struck by how much colder and inhospitable their staff was compared to the staff at the Club (even though Hyatt is supposed to be more luxe).

title: Excellent Staff
text: The location was perfect for my meetings at a venue nearby.  The rooms are a little cramped and spartan, but that was made up for by a lower price than nearby hotels.  What really made it excellent, though, was the staff.  Every person I saw that worked there was always smiling and ready to lend a hand whether it was for directions, recommendations for a restaurant or something needed.  The lounge has a complimentary coffee machine that makes great lattes and cappuccinos as well.  Great staff made for an excellent experience!

title: Great hotel
text: I love this hotel! It's so convenient to where I work and the staff are friendly. Check-in and check-out are easy. I also prefer a hotel where they only come to clean your room when you request it, and they take it even further by letting you text a number to request a room cleaning. Great place! I've stayed here 3 times now.

title: Very good hotel - comfort, location and sleep
text: Very comfortable stay - quiet and spacious room, good shower, and great sleep quality. It’s not a luxury hotel, but you’ll be comfortable and have a great space for exploring the city. Perfect location for Grand Central. Would certainly stay there again.

title: Sweet Retreat in NYC
text:
Great hotel! My girlfriend and I got the 2 twin bed set up. It was perfect! Beds were very comfortable, clean modern room. And we were on the 21st floor. 
We got to check in early. 
Front desk employees very friendly. 
The 27th floor lounge is sweet. Expresso coffee, filtered water and awesome view on the patio. 

I did request an extra pillow and hangars 2X and never received. But all good bc everything else was a great experience. The location is close to Grand Central station, Times Square, Central Park, 5th Ave, Bryant Park and theater district. Also Ess-a-Bagel on 831 3rd Ave worth the wait. 
Amazing bagels! 
I would stay again and can’t wait to go back.

title: Great value and location
text: Nice experience all around. The mattress needs to be replaced, but other than that it was a friendly staff, clean facility, excellent location for getting around, and nice amenities like the lounge with coffee/water.

title: Perfect Stay
text:
We booked a Superior room with kitchen and couldn't have been happier with our choice - we had a room on 16th floor, I had contacted the hotel before hand to ask for a room with corner windows and a street view and they were able to fulfil my request.
Helpful staff member on arrival who helped us check in - it was a bit later and we were tired after a long day of travelling. 
Housekeeping is on request and you can text the number provided and you can request this - we done this a couple of times and encountered no problems at all.
The room was fantastic - very clean and spacious with the small kitchen area and table and bed was very comfortable. Coffee maker provided which you can just use for hot water and make tea.
The lounge and terrace area on 27th floor was an added bonus with tea and coffee facilities and I must not forget to mention the great views.
Purified water and re fillable bottles on each floor was also an added bonus and very welcome as the weather was very warm during our visit.
I am so glad we found this hotel and would happily stay again, all staff were so friendly. Thanks for a great stay.

title: What a lovely experience and service!
text:
SHAUN!!!!   He was the best!! 

We had 4 guests in our room, and requested a cot. Shaun went above and beyond the required service and made a judgment call to put us in the biggest room available that could fit a cot, and still allow us to have the space that a suite would have.   He was kind and did everything to accommodate us. His demeanor was pleasant and deserves a huge commendation for his efforts to please us. This is our second stay at this chain of hotels in the span of two months, and I would definitely stay here again because of the service received.  Thank you again Shaun.

title: Excellent stay!
text: Excellent location for easy access to public transportation, shopping and the park. The front desk staff was very friendly and helped us to check in as their computers were not working properly . Room was clean and very comfy bed. There is a lounge on the upper floor with an inside and outside work/relaxing area. Coffee and tea available at no charge. Definitely would recommend this hotel!

title: Highly NOT recommended
text:
Terrible experience ! The hotel doesn’t provide with the housekeeping but the guest has to require . 
Even if the guest asks for the housekeeper at a specific time , they send the housekeeper upon their availability .  The room are just a bed space

title: Great location to see sites
text: Check-in smooth, no problem storing luggage with early arrival. Rooms clean and comfortable we had a great view over 9/11 site from room and roof top bar gives great view across city. Staff very friendly and accommodating and restaurant suggestions spot on. Great location.

title: Poor room cleaning and noisy - not worth the value
text: I stayed for 4 nights and had zero room cleaning for the whole period, even asking for it. Also, the room was very noisy at night. It is very well located, but did not deliver a good experience given its high price

title: Good hotel, bad tech
text:
Nice clean room. Good for a solo business traveler, but would be on the smallish side for two people.
Great location for Grand Central Station, terrific food options in the neighborhood. 
Tech needs attention. I was pointed to the check-in kiosk upon check-in, which didn’t work. Then at checkout the kiosks weren’t working again, and I had to write my email on a Post-it note to get a receipt.

title: Perfect place for a NYC holiday
text: This hotel was perfect for our first visit to NYC! The staff were lovely and friendly, the bed was the comfiest I’ve ever slept in & the location was brilliant… so many shops, restaurants & public transport links on the doorstep. There’s a lovely terrace & a lounge with hot & cold drink facilities to relax at the end of a busy day. Also, the staff kindly looked after our luggage when we checked out & went out for a final walk around the city before our late night flight. We look forward to staying here again if we visit New York again. Thank you so much 😊

title: Great NYC option
text: The hotel is in a safe zone, has excelent service and a reasonable price, its clean, and the staff are very kind. In front of the hotel you can buy food after 9:00pm. The hotel is close to Grand Central

title: Grand Central Surprise!
text: Prepared to be surprised by this unassuming hotel.  From the front desk staff to housekeeping, in fact everyone who maintains this facility is friendly and dedicated to making your trip memorable.  Rooms are great, the place is uber clean, the location is fantastic and that covered terrace on 27th floor is a game changer!  We will be back again and again!

title: Great experience!
text: Rooms have a good size and you have great amenities like machine to refill water available in your floor, wash machine and a gym room on the 3rd floor, a rooftop on the 27th floor where you can drink a cofee, take food or laptop while you appreciate the fantastic view!

title: My First Choice When In NY
text: I really enjoy everything about this hotel -- its location, its staff,  the rooms and comfort of the bed. The only thing I miss is an on-premise restaurant, but at least there are nearby options that are very good and the breakfast, while limited in what is provided, is nonetheless OK and is in a lovely environment.

title: okay
text: The bedroom was clean, however the bathroom was not and needed a lot of TLC... Our window would not shut properly so we could feel/hear the wind during our stay. While the location is A1, the hotel is not well identified. I was also very surprise there was no safe in the room, nor a fridge either. Coffee was good. It was overall calm on our floor, which I personally appreciated, but would not book again.

title: Perfectly Located Hotel with Fantastic Staff
text: We enjoyed our stay here so much, the location is excellent, room was very clean and actually quiet at night for NYC. Staff were all fantastic, so nice and friendly, they work so hard. We felt so welcome and love the way there are water bottles on all floors and the top lounge with seating and tea/coffee, is a great addition. You can come sit and chill out of your room, which is really nice. 100% will use this Hotel again and will advise anyone I know visiting NYC to use it also. Great value and wonderful staff, make it worth a booking! Thank you all who helped us with our questions and gave us great advice :)

title: Family trip
text: Good central location, clean and friendly would definitely stay again. Grand Central is a 2 min walk from hotel, 20min walk to Times Square. Johns cafe round the corner does a fab breakfast. Good views from the room and guest lounge for central New York

title: Consiglio assolutamente
text:
Posizione perfetta, letto super comodo.
Al 27 piano c’è una sala con terrazza in cui poter stare per un caffè o altro.
Al 3 piano invece ci sono 2 lavatrici/asciugatrici che sono state una salvezza. Distributori di acqua gratuita. 
Lo consiglio assolutamente.

title: great hotel in the heart of Manhattan
text: CQ Grand Central is a perfect hotel for discovering New York. Perfect location, the room is basic but good, the lobby on the 27th floor is good, nice view and free coffee. Very close to Grand Central. Good service.

title: BOMB DOT COM
text: Great hotel. Very comfy. Great location. Was a super comfy. Great place to stay. Real close to Grand Central Station, which was very convenient for traveling throughout the city into the airport. Would highly recommend to anybody that would like to stay there. I like the little water machine out in the hallway that gave you fresh ice cold water in a bottle to take for the road.  Awesome staff very convenient minimalistic rooms that enabled us to rest at the end of a long day walking all over this giant amazing city. Mike drop

title: Great stay/ Clean/ Very Central
text: It was a great stay! The room was quite big for NYC, very clean and the view is fantastic! The coffee room on the 27th floor is a great place to start your day right. Everyone was very nice and very supportive! We stayed 5 days and the hotel is located very central so you can walk to grand central station and to most of sightseeing spots! Thank you for everything!

title: Definitely recommend
text:
Really comfortable beds, powerful showers, great location, lovely common area and happy and helpful staff. 
It’s a kind of mix of hotel and apartment and is ideal for a sightseeing visit as we were not interested in a fancy hotel. This was clean, welcoming and central. Free drinking water with bottles  was a great addition.

title: Hotel at a good location
text: The hotel is situated 2 min walk from Grand Central station and easy to get to from JFK with Airtrain and "normal"train. The room was small, but we expected that from  a room in New York. POSITIVE: The room was clean,  and it had a coffeemaker and a small table with seating. There was free filtered water on our floor. there was no need to buy your own water.  The staff was very helpful. There is an indoor terrace area on the 27th floor with coffemachine and seating. The area around the hotel was very quiet compared to previous stays at other locations in NY. DOWNSIDE: There was no safe  or small refrigerator in the room. The bed was too short, and I am only 176 cm. If you are taller, your feet will be " hanging" out..

title: pretty darn good!
text:
We just returned from a family trip to NYC with 3 generations and we all liked CQ! The rooms were small (because, duh, NYC!) but well appointed and there was plenty of storage and places to stow away things. The sofa bed pull out was one of the most comfortable we have experienced and the staff was generally very helpful. The 27th floor is such wonderful bonus and make this hotel really stand out. Having extra space to hang out, bring in food, rest, etc, was fabulous. We were also able to check in super early which was so nice!

Our only disappointment was the room cleaning which was relatively okay, but not great. It seems silly at you should have to request to have your room cleaned and on one of the days, we requested a few hour block so that our son could be in the room for his nap time (he's 3), It didn't happen and I had to request again and they fit in a quick cleaning when we were out. Normally this wouldn't be such a big deal, but when traveling with a family and having a small space, it's an important reason we choose a hotel instead of an airbnb etc. To be clear, the custodial service itself was good and the hotel was very clean, but this added logistic was just a bit frustrating. All in all, I would definitely recommend.

title: Sophistication at its best
text:
CQ chain hotels especially NY, is true example of what one can expect of a seven star hotel. Well trained and courteous staff, neat and clean environment, the water stations on every floor are few of the points of this brilliant chain. 
Highly recommended for travelers to be their guest and automatically you will fall in love to become a permanent visiting member .

title: Nice clean hotel in midtown with quite large rooms
text:
In March 2023, I spent a few days in Manhattan with my wife.
The hotel is easy to reach and is centrally located directly on Grant Central.
The service was very good, the rooms relatively large for Manhattan, clean and according to the age in a good condition.

I really liked the coffee lounge, which is available around the clock.

When we visit New York again, this hotel is definitely back on our wish list.

title: Excellent choice
text:
This is a nice hotel.  Period.  I stayed for 3 nights, late March.  Shout out to Mark-Anthony at the check-in desk!  He makes you feel welcome.

Room:  Nice.  Lounge/terrace on the 27th floor:  Nice.  There is an automated coffee maker with SEVERAL options.  That was very nice, though I think that it needed better beans.  Still and sparkling water were on tap.  Assorted teas were available.

I hope to stay here again.

title: Great hotel in a great location
text: Have stayed in this hotel a couple of times now and would go back again. The location is perfect - central enough to be well placed for Times Square but not quite in the really busy area. It feels safe around the hotel. The rooms are smart and comfortable and I slept well. The lounge at the top of the hotel gives great views, including of the Chrysler building. The free coffee machine was a bonus.

title: Club Quarters at Grand Central-perfect!
text: This is a great hotel and in a perfect location for  price is very competitive and the rooms are of decent size. The king bed in our room was very comfortable with good quality bedding and pillows.  We have stayed at Club Quarters before and have always appreciated the value they offer!

title: Brilliant in every way
text:
Brilliant room ( bigger than most in New York )
Brilliant to have free Water and coffee 
Brilliant location 
Brilliant staff
Free washing facilities 
What more can you ask price was reasonable se well
We really enjoyed our stay at club quarters

title: Great location, clean and comfortable room, can't fault
text:
The Grand Central Club Quarters is extremely well located, and a good price for the location. The bed was one of the most comfortable I've ever slept in (I'm a business traveller). The room its self was small but had all that was necessary, with a decent shower, wifi, coffee maker etc. I'd happily stay at another CQ hotel if they are all this quality. 
Also - if you stay here, go and get coffee/breakfast at Little Collins on 3rd. The best coffee I have EVER tasted.

title: Bad lobby desk worker
text: Lobby worker blaming guest for opening wi dow when it was busted from the get go, held closed by 1 screw opend over 1inch all-around not blocking ouside noice or anything. At least the mantanace beleaved us and fixed it, no apology or anything from the snob glassed and bald lobby man.

title: Excellent
text: Excellent location and communication thank you. Clean and good size rooms. Excellent internet connection. Staff were very attentive and friendly. Knew a lot of the area. Thank you. Highly recommend this branch of hotels.

title: Excelente experiencia y ubicación
text: El hotel está perfectamente ubicado, la atención es muy buena y hay café y agua gratis. Podia ir caminandoba todos lados. Me encanta que no limpien mi habitación a menos que yo lo pida, ya que eso me permitia dejarla tal como yo queria y no veo necesario que personas entren a mi habitacion, cuando la uso solo para dormir. Volvería sin pensarlo!

title: Great location!
text: This hotel was a great location and value.  It is central to everything you want to do in the city center and right next to grand central for travel to other areas. Good restaurants in the area. Hotel is clean and while ny small - it was so nice to have a seating area/ table in the room.

title: New York back with a bang!
text:
That coffee machine on the 27th floor, omg, to die for.
Room cleaning by Manese made the room smell so fresh I needed it the most.
Front desk Shawn and Mark, were all so friendly, although I failed to take all names.
Terrific views!

title: I will not be going back
text: The room that I reserved was not available and they gave me a smaller room that was basically a closet. I was uncomfortable and stayed one day instead of the originally intended stay. I will not be going back.

title: Great stay
text:
This hotel is well priced for NYC. Great
Location, clean safe hotel. The room is small but very cute, efficiently designed and worked great!
The front desk people were awesome! So nice and helpful!
Check out isn’t until noon and we were able to store our bags until our train departure. 
Having grand central station close by was so fun too!

title: Ideal location in NYC
text: Hotel at reasonable price, functional rooms, and very friendly staff. Location close to Grand Central ideal for moving around. Did not try the common area at the top, but a previous time spent a nice time on the terrace with view along Lexington Ave

title: Great hotel
text: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel. There are three elevators so not much of a wait to get to the room and the rooms are nicely appointed. Staff was very friendly. A very comfortable hotel at a reasonable price.

title: Good for the price, but have no safe nor fridge at rooms
text: The rooms are good enough for the price, but I was highly disappointed by not having a safe or a mini fridge. The water and ice at the corridors are convenient as well as the coffee machine in the rooms.

title: Travel on budget! Amazing
text: One of the value in NYC. Small rooms but very clean. No pluck amenities but the top floor lounge offers an amazing view of grand central and unlimited coffee and tea of your choice. So if don’t want to break the bank but want to visit NYC, then this is the place to stay

title: The perfect New York accommodation!
text: This hotel was the ideal location to walk anywhere and access all of the great shopping and sites. It was the staff at this hotel that made the stay just perfect. They are so accommodating and helpful and made everything we wanted to do so easy! We couldn’t have asked for more and will definitely return.  After staying at this hotel, we wouldn’t stay anywhere else. It was home away from home.

title: Good location and clean room, bad service
text:
The pluses: very reasonably priced, very clean room, great location. The lounge on the 27th floor with a self serve espresso machine and sitting areas was a nice touch.

Of note, the room was pretty small, but for what we paid, that’s fine. They were a perfect size for a long weekend in NYC when we’d be out and about most of the time anyways. It was a little worse for wear however, and could use a renovation. That said, everything was functional, clean, and comfortable.

The negative: the service was very lacking. The first night we were there we called down for more pillows since there were only two on the bed and my partner needed to elevate himself to help with a persistent cough. It was somewhat late by this point, but it took over 45 mins to bring us two additional pillows. I’m not expecting instant service after 10pm at night, but 45+ mins seems a bit much. 

The late pillows would have been fine if they had come with pillow cases. Instead we got two pillows, still in plastic from the store so we knew they were new at least, but without pillow cases. It almost seemed that it had take so long because they’d run out and bought new pillows for us, haha.

At this point, it was pretty late, so I didn’t press the matter. In the morning, I texted the front desk to ask them to make up the room (housekeeping was by request instead of by default), and told them about the pillow situation. Instead of getting an apology for the mess up an assertion that they’d fix the issue, I got a curt “Housekeeping had been made aware of your request.” Whatever, as long as they take care of it, which they did not of course. We came back that evening to a still messy bed, no pillow cases, and clearly no other house keeping having been done.

All of this aside, I’d probably have not bothered writing a review if I didn’t come home to a $200+ charge posted on my credit card from them for a reservation we prepaid for via AMEX travel. I know hotels typically place a hold on your card for incidentals (and they did tell us they’d do this in the amount of $100), but this was an actual posted charge. I even confirmed that our balance was zero and there would be no further charges when we checked out. I called them and they said something about the payment/charge being misrouted for the room. They promised to refund the extra charge. We’ll see if this actually happens, if not, I’ll file a chargeback with AMEX, but it’s still annoying.

title: Definitely recommended, would visit again
text:
- the hotel has an excellent location, you can reach all main Manhattan attractions on foot or travelling up to 2-3 subway stations
- the lounge on the 27th floor provides a great leisure area with free water, tea, coffee and ice
- complimentary laundry and wi-fi plus a gym
- the rooms are very clean and well equipped, everything was working as expected
- the staff provides immaculate service with my special recognition to Mr. Terence Lloyd who helped out during a very stressful situation

title: Clean at a great location
text:
