text: I love this hotel!  I recently discovered Club Quarters about a year ago and have stayed a few times.  Great hotel staff, awesome amenities such as complimentary coffee, wine hour, snacks, etc. The gym is clean and newer equipment, although smaller, gets the job done.  This past visit, Greg @ the front desk, was awesome.  He was always smiling, helpful and made my stay better.

title: NYC Trip with my 21 year old daughter
text: We absolutely loved Club Quarters. Great location, comfortable room and we loved having a Keurig in our room and the fabulous 27th floor snack room with the great outdoor area. The refillable water bottles on each floor were so handy as we headed out each day. The staff was very accommodating- especially Elizabeth and Greg. We will be back!!

title: Trip inNY
text: L'hotel si trova in una posizione strategica.Vicino a Time Square al Rockfeller center, a Central park e alla Grand Central Station che facilitano gli Spostamenti per Brooklyn. Lo stass è gentilissimo e disponibile. Il roof al 27esimo piano è la ciliegina sulla torta. Dalle 5pm alle 6pm offrono vino e stuzzichini per peritivo, e cmq si può accedere a qualsiasi ora per usufruire di bevande calde e frutta. Acqua gratis a ogni piano e palestra. Ottima pulizia, stanze non molto grandi ma comunque confortevoli. Consigliatissimo! Penso che ci ritornerò!

title: Great location, wonderful staff
text: I stayed at Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central during the UNGA week this year.  This is the second time I stayed there. The hotel is clean, the staff members are friendly and very helpful.  The snack bar is so great. And the 5pm happy hour is not to be missed.

title: Great stay!
text: My husband and I were in New York both for business and my birthday and we stayed at club Q. Great place. Super easy check-in  and out and great room. The room was well laid-out and spacious. As well, the bed was extremely comfortable and the pillows perfect. I don’t like super strong coffee and the coffee in the room was delish. Liked the water bottles you could fill up on each floor. The 27th floor room was a  nice plus with munchies and wine at 5 ( we didn’t have but still...) the added bonus was that, when we told the front desk about our recent wedding and my birthday, they brought up wine and chocolates along with  a nice note of congratulations. Totally unexpected and sweet. Elizabeth the front desk girl was sweet, gregarious and helpful. She was awesome! We will come back here again for sure!!

title: Personal
text: Excelente hotel con muy buen servicio y atención hermosa la terraza llena de sorpresas y lo me jor es la atención que me brido Sara en frontón desk es excelente y muy preparada soy Alicia edul me encanto el hotel es muy limpio y muy buenas instalaciones

title: Hotel excelente em ótima localização
text: A equipe do hotel é extremamente simpática, nos receberam muito bem, anteciparam nosso check-in em 3 horas e o processo de check-in e check-out são super rápidos. O hotel possui 3 elevadores, que são extremamente rápidos, você não espera mais que 1 minuto pra subir ou descer. No 27º andar são servidos café, água, refrigerantes e snacks durante todo o dia e no happy hour ainda servem vinho de cortesia, um charme a mais para o serviço do hotel. Em todos os andares são disponibilizados garrafinhas juntamente com uma maquina para servir água, esses diferenciais não são encontrados em muitos hotéis em NY. O quarto não é grande, mas confortável para 1 casal, ideal para descansar depois de um dia cansativo andando pela cidade, tem microondas, maquininha de café, o banheiro tem uma ducha excelente. A localização é fantástica, perto da Grand Central, onde você pode se deslocar de metrô por toda a cidade, você pode caminhar com segurança durante a noite, região muito tranquila, chegamos no hotel depois de um show 1 hora da manhã e foi muito tranquilo e ainda tem a facilidade de poder andar até alguns pontos turisticos como a Times Square. Essa foi a segunda vez que fomos a NY e a primeira vez no Club Quarters, mas numa próxima visita com certeza será nossa escolha novamente.

title: Great location, nice rooms and superb views
text: Smooth checkin. Nice room. Spacious bathroom and big window. Nice views as of 12 Floor. Complementary water and coffee all day long. Fantastic view from 27 floor terrace. Only downside is very slow elevator.

title: Fantastic stay, excellent location
text:
We were really thrilled with our choice of accommodation as we wanted to be within walking distance but away from Times Square. The room was good sized with lots of storage space. 
Bathroom was lovely. 
The staff were all welcoming especially those in the social area. The snacks, coffee and wine were a perfect bonus! 
Can definitely recommend!

title: Terrific stay at CQ Grand Central
text: I've stayed at several Club Quarters locations in New York. This CQ is definitely the best experience to date. My room was very comfortable and the lounge space was great. The staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely choose to stay here again.

title: Great place....wine @ 5!
text:
Just got back today from a 4 night stay here. Great location....12 mins walk to Times Square and 18 mins to Empire State building. Grand central is only a few blocks away so accessible for the subway. 
The room was fine...not massive but NYC rooms rarely are but fine for my partner and I. 
The hotel has free water bottles and refill stations which were great given it was a very warm average 27 degs during our stay! On the 27th floor there is also complimentary tea, coffee and snacks throughout the day including fruit at breakfast. There is also wine at 5pm every day....great to have a glass sitting out on the terrace.
Check in and check out were easy and you can download and app to use the lift and save swiping your room card. Staff were always really helpful and smiling.
Overall great place and location. Would happily return!

title: Great location
text: Can’t beat the location- easy to get to the UN, Grand Central and all the major sites. No frills but very comfortable. Decent sized room, coffee machine and a small seating area. Good size bathroom and water available in recyclable bottles on each floor. The only problem was the TV which didn’t work the way it should and a drip drop in the air conditioning unit (I think) that kept me awake. I did the laundry service and it was efficient even though a bit expensive

title: Noisy and service is up to standard
text:
- The hotel is very noisy, so it is hard to have a good sleep.
- There are no slippers in the room.
- The internet is very to login and every time it requires room #, Name, and email address.
- The coffee machine is almost on the floor so it is not easy to use and there is no kettle for hot water.
- The snack bar on the top floor is helpful but the coffee machine does not already work.
- When I checked out, I was asked if I want to get my receipt printed or emailed. I said both. Then I was told that the printer was broken. One week later, I still have not received receipt in my email. I called back and left a message and no one returned. I just called back again and hopefully I will receive my receipt soon. It is a terrible experience to chase the receipt so that I can process my business trip related costs.

title: Courteous Staff, great lounge, shotty rooms.
text: Good value, great rooftop lounge, amazing staff. The showers sucked with handheld shotty heads. The TV in room never worked well as well. Overall, it’s a pretty compact hotel with no employee elevator...but good value for its location.

title: elizabeth upstairs in the lounge is the best!!!
text: upstairs during the happy hour we had the pleasure of being greeted by the amazing and gorgeous host, Elizabeth. she was so sweet and really made our stay at the club quarters! will definitely be back because of her!!

title: Great location
text:
This is the best possible location if you like to get about on foot,also handy for Grand central and times square, simple rooms that work,good coffee always available in the lounge.
GoodGfree wine available after five everyday with snacks.

title: Awesome hotel
text: Such a great hotel. We booked fairly last minute and got a great price. The hotel is in a good location just around the corner from grand central. The rooms were clean and had all we needed in them. The hotel lounge was such a money saver, we could get a coffee, fruit and a cereal bar for breakfast and have a glass of wine and snacks before heading out for the evening. It also had a lovely terrace with a nice NY view. For what we paid we felt this was a really great NY find!

title: Perfect Location!
text:
We stayed two nights and found the service, amenities offered, and its location to be top notch
The hotel is geared toward the business traveller with work space available in the room as well as on the 27th floor. The standard room itself is small but adequate, though the bed could have been more comfortable. Our room 1503 needed some small maintenance.
The staff was exceptional and always ready with any assistance.
They do offer reduced rate parking should you have a vehicle which was nice. We parked and used the subway or walked wherever we needed to go.
They offer a free wine and snacks on the 27th floor each evening, free use of the laundry, easy check in and out among other conveniences.
I would not call it a family type hotel, but it is a great spot for the business traveller and adult travellers.

title: No fuss, great value
text: hotel is quick and efficient. Small lobby. Does the job. Rooms are nice and everything is smartly put away. For the price, can't beat this location and the rooms are nothing special but also not dingy or tired (like the nearby Roosevelt!). Nice happy hour amenity and roof deck if you can enjoy that.

title: Sept 2019
text: Great central location. Staff were very welcoming, friendly and helpful. The snacks and drinks on the terrace every evening is a nice touch. Only slight negative was the WiFi was a bit patchy and kept dropping from my phone

title: Great Customer Service!
text: Only staying for one night, but very impressed. Hotel in a nice location, tooms, smart TVs w/pairing ability/apps. However the customer service by Johhny D finding me ketchup in the middle of the night is tops! Came through in the clutch! Staff overall as well, but he went above and beyond.

title: Highly Recommend
text: We loved everything about Club Quarters. The rooms, cleanliness, staff were ultra accommodating, beds comfortable, price. It was very clear that the staff were interested in meeting your needs. The location was perfection for us as it was across the street from Grand Central Station where we arrive into NYC by train.

title: Great staff. Good ideas
text: The Club Quarters Grand Central is perfectly located for most of my business trips to NYC. Friendly and helpful staff, who seem to actually enjoy helping hotel guests. Great idea the hotel has - the refillable water bottles on each floor. Clean room.

title: Jisung Oh
text:
위치: 5/5
가격: 4/5
룸상태: 5/5
친절함: 5/5
라운지: 5/5
뉴욕여행하면서 숙소 정말 잘 선택했다고 많이 느낌.
가성비 정말 좋았던 숙소.
방 크기도 두명이 여행용가방 펼쳐놓아도 될만큼 여유로웠으며 온수도 콸콸, 수압도 좋고. 청소도 깔끔하게 하고 갔다. 물론 최신호텔은 아니지만 뉴욕 호텔의 살인적인 가격에 비하면 모든게 용서된다.
아, 다음엔 다른호텔 이용할 예정입니다. ㅋ

title: MP
text:
Lovely boutique hotel away from the hubbub of Times Square but close enough to walk to the theatre. 
Great view of NY from the 27th floor patio. Several nice restaurants in the area. Close to Grand Central and the subway system.

title: Average: standard is dropping
text:
Second stay and noticed that standard is dropping. Window handle was broken, elevator buttons do not work, etc.
Nice place but owners should invest a bit to keep up the place. 
Terrasse is of course great and room are good. Quiet.

title: Great staff
text:
After 9 nights at the hotel. I wanted to say that the staff was great and very welcoming, especially Elizabeth who was very helpful and nice and took care of everything I needed with a smile, which defiantly made my stay there much more easier!
Hopping to get back soon!

title: our new york break
text: Hotel location is ideal for tourists, with Grand Central station 5 minutes walk and Time Square 20 minutes. Room was clean, comfortable and a good size for a basic room. Staff were pleasant,  welcoming and always keen to assist

title: great location in midtown
text: verkehrsgünstige Lage an einem Verkehrsknotenpunkt in New York, moderne Zimmer mit Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, großem Fernseher, guter  Roomservice, Ungeclortes Trinkwasser, Kaffee, Obst und Cerialienriegel umsonst

title: Average at best
text: It was OK, but would likely not stay there again.  It's a bit of a small think, but if a guest needs an iron and ironing board, I don't feel the guest should have to go to a communal closet inn the hall to get it and hope it is available.

title: Great location
text: Perfect for my meeting at MetLife building. Easy check-in and person at reception stopped her discussions with someone to actually help me check out since that was a quick transaction. Good service personnel.

title: Very Nice - Third Stay in 3 Months!
text: This hotel is everything you need in NYC - convenient location near Grand Central, very nice staff, easy check in and check out, affordable, and most importantly...clean.  The daily happy hour is a great perk as well!

title: A Top Rate Hotel
text:
Once again we stayed at the Club Quarters/ Grand Central Location.

Everything about the hotel is marvelous....from the location, to the price, to the friendly, caring and helpful staff. A special thanks to Elizabeth/ Liz, at check out for being so kind and friendly.

Simply put, this is a great place to stay

title: Great hotel. Great staff.
text:
We stayed in this hotel at the end of August and then again for three nights in September.
This is a great hotel in a fantastic location. Close to Grand Central station, The Empire State and the Chrysler Building. 
My partner is in a wheelchair, so things aren’t always easy. The staff were all very friendly and extremely helpful. 
Yes, the rooms are small, but it’s Manhattan, if you want a big room, you’re gonna have to pay way more than Club Quarters prices. The room was very clean and had everything we needed.
I would say the only downside to this hotel is the very temperamental elevators!!! Don’t always expect to end up on the floor you want at the first time of trying.
That said, we would definitely stay here again due to location and friendly staff.

title: Streamlined comfort
text:
This was my second stay at CQ Grand Central, and although the room was rather dark, on a lower floor this time, the room itself, the amenities, & the service were all very satisfying and professional. It’s location is in the center of the heart of Manhattan: minutes from Grand Central. The roof deck, in particular, is a welcome refuge and resource. 

My reservation, and my check-in was last minute so the room assignment was understandable. The desk clerk managed to provide an improved room for the second day and night. CQ will remain among my first choices for a stay in NY.

title: Professional
text: I enjoyed my stay at Club Quarters.  Very clean spaces, LOVED the lighting in the bathroom for getting ready in the moring.  Nice work space as well as very relaxing. Enjoyed the "Living Room" on the top floor and the view was amazing.

title: Great stay
text: Great location,  comfortable room, plenty of snacks to choose from on the 27th floor. The coffee was excellent. The views from the top terrace were spectacular. I definitely liked that you had chilled water on each floor.

title: Great stay
text:
Great location, friendly staff and a clean room. Great free wine and snacks between 5-6 in the roof top bar. Would recommend to anyone visiting New York. Staff always welcomed you as you came in and out of the hotel and made us feel very welcome. 

From Hannah and Tom

title: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION
text: This location by far was the best and I'd been to NY more than 3-4 times, this is the most centrally located hotel, close to touristy sites, local shops, train station, and main shopping area of 5th avenue. Price of the room was reasonably by NY standard and my room wasn't like a shoe box, so I can't complain much. I only don't like the noise due to lower level room assignment, window facing the main street. Other than that, I love this hotel location and the perks - Wine at 5 everyday at Level 27, what a view of NY skyline!!!

title: Reasonable hotel
text:
The cost is reasonable compare with another same level hotel. I spended lots of time for looking for accomodation. Because newyork hotel cost is really expensive. 
I kept searching internet review. So i choose this one.
I also recommend this hotel. Clean, good staff, good condition bath.
Location is not in main. But it doesn’t matter for sightseeing

title: Perfect stay!
text: Great hotel at a perfect location in NY city. We were 3 persons and the room was big enough considering we are talking about New York. Grand Central was around the corner so there was no problem to get anywhere. On the 27th floor there was coffee, sodas, fruits and snacks available for free and the terrace was a great place to hang out. I would recommend this hotel anytime. We‘ll come back here 100%.

title: Excelente servicio.
text: Muy buena localización, varios servicios (vino, snacks, lavanderia, gimnasio, etc) que lo hacen muy bueno para pasar unas vacaciones, o bien, viaje de trabajo. El personal muy atento, especialmente Elizabeth y Pete. Las habitaciones muy cómodas, limpias y sin ruido, quizás el único detalle es la decoración que no es tan moderna.

title: Great hotel
text: Clean, modern, efficient hotel with friendly and helpful staff.  Beds are comfortable and hotel was quiet except for the expected street noise here and there.  Location is terrific and there is a poke/ramen place across the street -- what more could you want?  Rooftop terrace is beautiful.  Coffee, water, snacks, fruit all available around the clock.  Did not use the gym or laundry facilities but would have for a longer stay.  Rooms are small but well thought out and there is everything one generally wants/needs.  A/C worked great.  Elevators are a bit finicky but not a big deal.  I found this hotel to be much preferable to bigger hotels like the Hyatt or Marriott.

title: Very satisfied
text:
We were very satisfied with our stay and the price (relative to NYC pricing). Generally clean and comfortable and friendly staff. The hotel is a bit nontraditional in that the lobby is small and bare bones, but the rooms are pretty typical, and the hotel has a large indoor and outdoor area on the 27th floor with coffee, tea, water, and snacks that is basic but nice. By the time we got back at night, the snacks were down to apples and oranges, but in the morning there were also jars of nuts, M&Ms, little pieces of toast, and one or two other things.

The room was not large but larger than we expected, and the bathroom was large by NYC standards. No tub, but nice sized shower, and plenty of flat space to put toiletries. Not as many towels as most hotels provide, but enough. And they did provide shampoo, soap, etc. The bed was comfortable enough; only two pillows but oversized ones. A/C worked fine. There is no minibar in room, but there is a Keurig with both caffeinated and decaffeinated tea and coffee. We were on the 12th floor facing the street; you could hear the street but it wasn't loud.

The elevators did not seem to take an inordinate amount of time. Though we never made it to the wine happy hour, it seems like a nice amenity.

This area of Manhattan is generally a bit quieter than other areas, at least on weekends, but we like that, and this hotel is just a few short blocks from Grand Central.

title: I`d stay again!
text:
great location near Grand Central Station. Like most hotels in NYC it now has the dreaded resort-destination fee, but at least at this hotel you feel like you get something for it. A lovely penthouse lounge with patio, snacks and happy hour with decent wines.
Rooms were tiny (reminded me of a cruise ship) but well laid out, but bathrooms spacious. Who is in their room much in NYC anyway?
Great staff, especially Elizabeth at the front desk and happy hour pourer!

title: Bit basic but not a basic price!
text: Bit tired and didn’t feel value for money. Good location but room was basic, lifts took forever to come every time and always only 2 out of 3 working. Price wasn’t cheap so was a bit of a let down unfortunately

title: Fantastic Week at CQ: Grand Central
text: We are regulars at all the Club Quarters in NYC. But the Grand Central location is a gem! We hosted an event at the rooftop one night, and our stay during the week was so pleasurable. Not to mention that Greg G. is so hospitable, he gave us great tips on where to dine. Definitely coming back again, but not soon enough!

title: Lounge at 27 floor
text: Very good! it is the second time that I stay there. I loved and recommend that to another friend that will stay at happy new year! The happy hour is excellent! The wine and snack is so good and I loved MM chocolat. There some fruits. Marcos attended us and he is a very good person.

title: Ganske fint
text:
Hotellets beliggenhed er perfekt. I den mere stille ende af Midtown, men alligevel på alt. Mam bruger dog enormt megen tid på elevatorerne - enten på at vente på dem, eller også på at køre i dem.
Tagterrassen er eminent.
Hvis man fik fikset elevatoren, skiftet sengetøjet ud til noget der var lidt mindre syntetisk og så ellers lavet en ordentlig aftale om morgenmad med restauranten i kælderen, var vi på et femtal. Det sidste kan dog klares med en kort gåtur i området, hvor der er masser af cafeer.

title: Excelente relación calidad - precio
text: Limpio, silencioso, cómodo, habitaciones muy amplias, buenas vistas, café de cortesía en la habitación todos los días, paradas de metro a un minuto, a dos del World Trade Center, botellas de agua fresca gratuitas en todos los pasillos... Encantados de haber elegido este hotel. Si volvemos a NY repetiremos.

title: Welcoming, great location
text: Many thanks to the Club Quarters staff, especially Jillian on reception, for making our brief stay in NY so enjoyable.  The room was spotlessly clean, staff so friendly and location was perfect.  Definitely the place to stay on our next trip...see you then!

title: Decent hotel in a good location. Rooms could do with a minor update.
text: Good location near Grand Central Station. Decent rooms - not heaps of space (understandable in NY), and a little dated. We weren’t allowed in even an hour or two early to our room, which was not our experience anywhere else in NY or the States, and frustrating given we’d flown overnight from San Fran. We loved the rooftop space and free drinks during happy hour.

title: Hotel Boutique
text: Well located to Grand Central Terminal and the subway system. Check in was a breeze. There is a lobby and a very large patio on 27th floor with free drinks and snacks. The views are great . I would consider staying at Hotel Boutique again.

title: Nice Place
text:
This hotel is in a great location, within walking distance to many attractions and super close to Grand Central for public transportation. The rooms are small, but well appointed. I wouldn't recommend more than two people share a room. The room was also quiet even the rooms with a view. They offer some unique and awesome amenities in this hotel, like the room on the 27th floor that always has snacks, coffee, ice and water available along with a great view. They also have a nice workout room and offer the use of a washing machine and dryer for free. Now with that being said, this place is not without it's quirks. They are bare bones when it comes to pillows, only two, guess we could have asked for more, it just seemed like too much trouble.  The A/C in our room made a crazy rattling noise, again our fault for not letting them know and giving them a chance to fix it. And like many NYC hotels the elevator was a bit slow at times, and you had to use your keycard before choosing a floor, this was tricky to achieve and aggravating at times. One more thing, I don't think they offer king sized beds. Maybe they have a few but were no longer available when we traveled. 
Now with that being said, I would not hesitate to stay here again, especially if the price is right.

title: Perfeito
text: Fiquei no hotel com meu noivo do dia 08 ao dia 20 de maio de 2019, e não há do que reclamar. Pelo contrário. Quarto limpo e espaçoso, funcionários atenciosos e ótima localização. Voltaria com certeza! Agradecimento especial aos funcionários Ashley e Rey, que nos ajudaram em tudo.

title: Nice place to stay in city center
text: Great location, decent room space , very helpful staffs, professional service. The club living room is located in the top floor, from which you can find a good view of the midtown area. Before stay in CQ, I also spent 8 days in another 4-star hotel in midtown west of NY, but I'd say CQ providers much better service.

title: Great location- friendly staff- ok rooms
text:
Stayed a few nights during a business trip to NY.
The location is great- you can walk ( it’s not super close but it is walkable) to Central Park and there are plenty of nice little cafes and shops around the corner from this hotel. 
Ofcourse there is also the grand central building where you can take the subway various directions which was practical and an experience in itself!
In the afternoon you can enjoy the roof Terrace with a drink during the social which was a quite nice little extra.
Rooms a small but I’ve gathered that’s typical NY..

title: Friendly, relaxed atmosphere with wonderful amenities
text: This hotel is in a perfect location, with lovely, clean rooms and common spaces for lounging, taking in the view or having a snack. And if you want an elegant meal, there a restaurant on the lower level that's first class! From the first moment I walked in I was welcomed by one of the friendly staff--Greg...and later was expertly assisted by Elizabeth getting cabs, and answering questions...This hotel will be my choice whenever I return to NYC.

title: Amazing hotel
text: Great customer service from all the staff, and we enjoyed the happy hour service a lot. The view from the rooftop was breathtaking and had a nice area to sit and relax. I would definitely love to return to this hotel.

title: Very good time had by all
text: Great location one block from Grand Central Station and a few blocks away from Times Square (enough away so you don’t have to deal with the traffic). Awesome friendly staff (Elizabeth) and 27th floor free snacks, water, soda and coffee all day was wonderful. 5pm free wine and additional snacks incredible. Discount on parking down the street (ICON - 33/night) are you kidding me? Can’t find that anywhere else.

title: Mid Manhattan Hotel
text:
We stayed here for a business trip. The club room is very small, but had a bar fridge and microwave. The location is excellent. The room was very clean, and the staff helpful. 
There is a hospitality room on the 27th floor with a terrace area. There are free drinks and snacks 24/7 and free wine from 5-6pm. 
The Italian restaurant attached to the hotel had very average food. 
I’d stay here again, but would get a bigger room. The a/c was too loud to have on to sleep, so it made the night very hot.

title: Always a great stay!
text: This is truly my favorite hotel in NYC. I’ve never had any issues, and I always feel comfortable, safe, and at home here. The rooftop/lounge, location, and other amenities can’t be beat. Highly recommend!

title: Great location
text: Loved the location -- steps from Grand Central. Room was nice and comfy if a bit on the smaller side. Absolutely LOVED the terrace/lounge on the 27th floor. Great views and great place to meet friends. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Location and value
text: In the heart of the City of NY, this hotel is quiet and understated,. Good place for business, walk to everything. No restaurant or bar but there are thousands next door. If you don't need a doorman to open the door for you or a bell hop to take your bags, you will like this hotel.

title: Excellent location, rooms leave a lot to be desired
text: First, THE GOOD. The location is convenient (across from Grand Central and right on Lexington Ave, useful for grabbing taxis), the bed was comfortable, the water pressure was strong, and the internet connection was reliable -- so this hotel it hit my Top Four needs nicely. THE BAD. The rooms are ridiculously tiny even by Manhattan standards. The luggage surface accommodates only modest-sized suitcases, so I had to hoist my large suitcase onto the desk -- but it's not really a desk, just a horizontal board resting on somewhat wobbly legs,  something clearly designed to look stylish more than offer any practical use. A lightbulb was out by the bed (sorry, but this is worth noting in a room with only two lamps) and the light at the bathroom mirror didn't work. Don't bother having any guest meet you in the lobby, which is a small room with no place to sit and a little ck-in stand like a restaurant maitre d' would use. When I asked for a 1pm checkout instead of noon, I was told that would cost an additional $50. Even with the pluses mentioned above, why would I want to return to a place that nickels and dimes you like this, when the city has so many properties that make me feel welcome?

title: Io ci tornerei
text:
Buona posizione fra la 45 e la Lexington a pochi passi dalla Grand Central e dalla metro.’zona dotata di tutti i bar. Stanze piccoline ma pulite funzionali e bagno con doccia nuovo. Ottimo servizio bar gratuito al 27 piano con serata dalla vista spettacolare. Ape gratuito dalle 17.
Reception attenta e gentile. Ottima pulizia sta se con cambio giornaliero. Prezzo nn basso in linea con Ny! Unico neo la scarsa insonorizzazione delle stanze

title: Clean, quiet, nice touch with coffee bar upstairs on roof
text: Staff very thoughtful and helpful.  Room was minimum... too much light from the glass door to the bathroom in the night and morning.  More amenities in the bathroom please... and guest "closet" in hall was nearly empty.

title: Modern Style, Great Location -> Great Value
text: Rooms as expected are small but they have everything you need.comfy beds & modern style and most importantly in my case is great location. I’d come here again If traveling solo or with a partner. Spend your whole day and night outside, enjoy NYC. You should only need the room for recharging your energy.

title: Muy recomendable, volvería!!!
text: Excelente ubicación, amabilidad y simpatía de Elizabet siempre dispuesta a resolver nuestras dudas  Agua disponible en cada piso, terraza en el piso 27 con todos los servicios y excelentes vistas. Happy hours de 17:00 a 18:00 con buenos vinos y snacs.

title: Service was subpar
text: It took 4 hours to check in after being told over and over that my room wasn't ready. I've never had this type of issue before and it was very disappointing and tiring.  Probably won't be staying here again.

title: Outstanding service
text: Outstanding service.  We have stayed at several club quarters and we like Grand Central the best. Not to say that the other ones are not good. But we really like Grand Central the best.    Outstanding customer service. The rooms are very clean as is the entire hotel. It was a great place for us to spend our 40th wedding anniversary

title: Excellent Location for a busy city trip
text: Stayed here for 4 nights in early August. My third time in NY but my first time staying in this hotel and I hope it won’t be my last. Excellent location close to Grand Central Station & subway. Nice coffee shops & restaurants close by for good food. Grand Central food market across the street & a few nice Irish bars within a few minutes walk for a night cap. Check in & out was very easy. Water stations on every floor a big plus. Didn’t use lounge but it is a nice addition to have free snacks & hot drinks available throughout the day. Nice spacious room with plenty of room for big cases. Overall noise was not an issue in comparison to other areas of Manhattan.

title: We liked this hotel alot!
text: This hotel is very nice, clean and staff was friemdly and helpful. The location made it easy to get around the city.  We've made 6 trips to nyc and this was our favorite hotel so far. Would stay there again for sure!  The 27th floor hospitality room with outdoor patio was outstanding!!!

title: A Really Great Experience
text:
Ordinarily, as a member locked into the Intercontinental Hotel Group, we'd almost always stay at a Crowne Plaza, Intercontinental or Holiday Inn.  However, we used to stay often at the original Club Quarters in midtown Manhattan and Wall Street.  

The staff at CQ were just wonderful from the moment we stepped into the hotel.  All staff members wishes us good morning/afternoon/evening with a sincere smile.  The front desk staff were superb and more engaged than any hotel employee I have spoken with for a while (I wish I had kept their names so I could thank them directly here).

The room and bathroom was spotless and in great condition.  Our room was rather small, but perfectly functional.  The bed and linens were very comfortable.  I normally request a high floor in Manhattan, but no this occasion, we were given a seventh floor (of 26).  However, we both slept very well, since although our room looked out on to Lexington Avenue, the room is wonderfully sound-proofed (unlike many).

The hotel has a comfortable 27th floor lounge with a beautiful patio affording views up and down Lexington and a direct view of the spire of the Chrysler Building.

Beautiful branding throughout the hotel,  Thoughtful amenities such as water filling stations with recyclable bottles.   Coffee on demand in the 28th floor lounge area.  

Checkout could not have been simpler, and one of the best employees even got our bags for us after having clocked out.

Club Quarters, Grand Central was beyond faultless!

title: Recommending to Friends and Family
text: The Club Quarters at Grand Central Station exceeded our expectations.  The staff was courteous and helpful.  The room was clean, very nice, and comfortable.  The Living Room and outdoor deck on the top floor was unique and most enjoyable and especially appreciated the coffee machine in the morning!

title: MARAVILHOSO!
text:
Hotel super bem localizado (praticamente ao lado da Grand Central), limpo e com várias ideias bacanas:
- No rooftop durante a manhã eles servem grátis café, frutas, barras de cereais, etc. Muito bom pq não é necessário gastar fora do hotel.
- Todos os andarem possuem uma máquina de água com garrafinhas. Legal pois dá pra levar pros passeios.
- No terceiro andar, possuem máquinas de lavar roupas e sabão em pó, tudo grátis.
- Todas as tardes, das 17:00h às 18:00h tem vinho liberado no rooftop. Um clima muito legal!
Nossos cumprimentos a Gilian, Marcos e Elisabeth, que sempre nos atenderam muito bem, com toda simpatia do mundo.

title: Buenísimo, céntrico, cómodo
text: Elizabeth y Greg son muy amables y atentos. Gran experiencia con el hotel durante toda la estancia. Excelentes vistas tanto en las habitaciones como en la terraza común. Las habitaciones espaciosas y muy limpias.

title: Clean, nice amenities and friendly staff
text: This hotel is located near Grand Central terminal. The hotel and room were immaculate , free wi-fi, nice tv. There’s a rooftop terrace open to hotel guests with coffee, water and snacks. We loved this hotel and will stay again.

title: Buenísimo, céntrico, cómodo
text: El hotel fue un 10 en todos los aspectos. Rooftop muy agradable, habitaciones perfectas (cama cómoda, elegantes vistas, baño limpio) y una atención en recepción exquisita. Greg y Elisabeth nos atendieron fenomenal.

title: Fun times
text: Had an amazing time at Saturday happy hour all you can drink wine with staff members Elizabeth and Marcos. They were both very sweet and even gave suggestions of places to visit in the city! Thanks again! Will definitely suggest and book again with Club Quarters Grand Central.

title: 객실 청결 부족, 직원 매우 친절(部屋の清潔さそこそこ、スタッフ親切)
text:
제일 작은 사이즈의 룸을 예약했는데 후기에서 본 방이 작다는 것을 보고 걱정했으나 그정도로 좁지는 않았다.
그랜드 센트럴 터미널에서 가까워서 그런지 교통편은 매우 편리했다. 다만 객실의 청결도는 조금 아쉬웠다. 그리고 2일차에 객실청소가 미흡하였고 침대의 시트교체가 되어있지 않고 정리만 되어있었다. 그 외에 나머지는 매우 만족.
一番ノーマルな部屋を予約して、リビューでは部屋が狭いとの事だったが、それほど狭くはなかった。また、グランドセントラル駅から近く、交通利用が結構便利。ただし、客室の掃除が二日目に見たら、ベッドのシート交換をしてくれなくて、惜しい部分があった。客室のキレイ度はそこそこ。スタッフはみんな笑顔で優しい。

title: Great value for money just steps away from Grand Central Station.
text:
Great value for money just steps away from Grand Central Station. Kind and friendly staff who were always willing to help. The hotel was clean, the rooms were newly renovated, and the bathroom was OK. 

Most importantly: location, location, location. Situated on 45th Street and Lexington, being so close to Grand Central Station was a huge plus. I definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Great space to get my work down and get a few winks
text: The room was reasonably priced for midtown Manhattan and provided everything I needed from a place to get my work done to a place for getting some sleep.  It had it all, the hotel certainly knows how to maximize the space it provides.

title: Great location
text: Fantastic location near Grand Central Terminal, near to various buses and subway lines. Simple hotel rooms, but lacking nothing. Great little lounge on the 27th floor with a terrace and some cool views.

title: A gem of a place
text: Excellent location convenient to metro and shops. Most pleasant staff, friendly and kind. Comfortable room larger than we expected with a well- designed sitting area. Modern shower, clean room and well- appreciated coffee device

title: Great Stay!
text:
Rooms are small like every other NYC hotel, but very comfortable and clean. Quiet despite being steps from Grand Central, comfortable bed. Very happy with our stay overall. 
PS Free bottled water, coffee and daily free wine hour before dinner were a classy touch.

title: Todo del Hotel nos encanto!!!
text: El Hotel estuvo perfecto y esta localizado super cerca del Gran Central y de lugares para comer. El personal es muy amable y dispuesto a ayudar. En el piso 27 tiene snack y cafe. Tiene una vista preciosa y el lugar y las calles se sienten seguras.

title: Will stay again
text:
This is my second stay at your facility. We have visited three CQ locations and Grand central is the best.! 
Like to take this opportunity to thank your staff members for their professional assistance. Special appreciation goes to Jillian and Elizabeth, for going above and beyond to make accommodations after my over night flight... the other front desk staffs were always friendly and willing to help, the gentlemen working on the 27th lounge keep the place clean and well maintained all the time ( it is not easy to keep the lounge ready and presentable 24/7!). Overall, I have noticed that staff member at your facility pay attention to what they do. Not only they do their job well but they make the guests fell they like what they are doing !  I have stayed in other hotels, Jillian, Elizabeth, and all your hardworking pprofessionals have made CQ Grand Central standing out! Also like to mention your clean rooms, microwave, fast elevators, coffee and snacks, especially the 27th floor lounge with a view ... 
I have left a review on Hotels.com . I booked with them.

title: Perfect Hotel in a Perfect Spot
text: The hotel is right next to grand central which made taking the subway so much easier! The hotel was very clean and comfortable. The only negative feedback would be the shower pressure was terrible. The sink had more pressure lol. But the bed and view was fantastic. And the lounge on the rooftop... WOW!!! Free snacks and coffee all day and then free wine from 5-6?! It was FANTASTIC!

title: Great service, amenities and location in mid-town
text: Really enjoyed my two-night stay at the CQ Grand Central. It feels like a new hotel, with updated room features (plenty of outlets), and speedy elevators. The staff are all great - based on their attitude, this hotel is well managed. They have a really nice top floor lounge with snacks and sodas, and a late afternoon happy hour. There's a deck to get some fresh air and a view of the Chrysler building nearby. The location is just a block from Grand Central. I was on the back side of the hotel - still had a little view but no street noise, which was great. Will definitely stay here again on another trip to NYC.

title: Buena experiencia, volveria!!
text:
El personal se esfuerza en brindar una estancia placentera. Ademas la mayoría habla español lo que facilita mucho la interacción. El café y los snack están muy bien ademas de la hora de vino por la tarde. La ubicación es fantástica a unos 100 mts de Grand Central Station con lo que te puedes mover muy fácil. Las habitaciones son pequeñas pero no diminutas como en otros hoteles de la zona en los que he alojado. La cama bien cómoda para 2 personas. Estuvimos en habitación con cocina la que esta habilitada con cafetera, vajilla, nevera y horno microondas. Perfecto para estancias largas!!!
 · Todo estuvo fantástico incluso nos dieron una habitación superior a la contratada. Había visto comentarios de la basura en los alrededores y si, a partir de las 19:00 acumulan mucha basura los edificios y locales comerciales pero es algo que no depende del hotel y es una situación que se ve en todo el sector. El. hotel esta conectado con un Restaurante "Dablos" que me pareció bueno pero bastante costoso...Para que vayan preparados!!!.

title: Steps from Grand Central
text: Very friendly and helpful staff. Rooms were small, but you’re in Manhattan! Rooms were very clean and smelled fresh. Bed was super comfy. Twenty-seventh floor is goo for a quick snack or coffee, with a terrace and business center.

title: Go here
text: Next to, practically in, Grand Central.  Great location.  Great value.  Well run.  Clean room.  Highly recommend.  Not easy to find a reasonable place in midtown with great security.  The free snacks, the free laundry and the views from 27th FL make this a must go to hotel in NYC

title: Best all around choice & Sandy rocks
text: This is the newest in the Club Quarters chain and the new design is fantastic.  Always a great value, super clean, comfortable and efficient, I was most impressed by Sandy who helped me professionally, kindly and efficiently with a tricky reservation situation I created by mistake.  Definitely recommend this hotel highly!

title: Excellent Midtown Hotel
text: This was an excellent hotel to stay at in the heart of Manhattan. Clean room, and really helpful and friendly staff members. The little extras made this hotel great: a small gym, laundry room and lounge and balcony with free snacks and a great view (and free wine for a couple of hours each day!). I’d definitely stay again.

title: Value for money
text: I enjoyed my stay. They had thought of all the essentials!Restaurant on the 27th Floor has fruits and snacks for residents free of charge all day round, purified water on all floors,Happy hour with free wine every day at five pm.Business centre free of charge...what more could I ask for?

title: מלון סביר פלוס
text:
מלון נחמד , אחלה מיקום, שירות טוב ואגיב מצד העובדים. החדר  מרווח 
אבל קצת מיושן בעיצוב. קומת הגג שווה עם קפה וחטיפים חינם. היתה בעיה עם המעליות, זמן המתנה ארוך. סהכ חוויה נעימה, הכל באפן יחסי למחיר. ו ו

title: Very Good
text:
Bra hotell med superläge! Vi bodde där mer 'än en vecka.
Bra service!!  Fantastisk 27 våning med gratis snacks. Gratis vin serverades mellan kl 17-18. 
Elizabeth gav oss exellent service och hjälpte oss mycket med vad vi än behövde. Tack!!
När brandlarmet gick på natten kunde informationen varit tydligare, även om det bara var ett falskt alarm!!

title: Stay 128 E 45th st, Ny.NY
text: I stay at this hotel in your CQ chain whenever it is available when I come to NY.  The African American male at the front desk is so helpful.  He has checked me in the last three times I have stayed and remembered me, which considering NYC, is pretty amazing.    He always has a warm greeting and supplies efficient information.  I have stayed at all your NY locations over the past 15 years, and this guy should be made manager at those locations.  The staff at the other locations can never find me in the system, and show little care.  The Spanish woman at the front desk was very nice to others that I heard, but I did not have any transactions with her.  The 45th st hotel is the place to stay in NYC.

title: Confortable and nice.
text: This hotel is located near from grand central station, it’s silent, clean, and the staff is very friendly. The price is good, and this was the second time in that place. The room is small, but in NYC all the rooms are small, so I recommend it.

title: Centrally located, well worth a stay!
text: A little dated setup, but awesome location (2 mins from Grand Central Station), great rooftop lounge and free washing/ dryer! Also, look out for 5 pm wine everyday - which I never did make it anyway due to work ...

title: Molto buono
text: L'hotel non è elegante né moderno come appare in foto. Le stanze avrebbero bisogno di un ammodernamento sia nella moquette che nel mobilio, mentre la zona comune della terrazza si presenta più curata. Non c'è spazio nella hall,  compensato dalla piccola deliziosa terrazza che affaccia sul crysler e dove si può sempre stuzzicare qualcosa di diverso a seconda degli orari. Buona la pulizia,  la distanza dal centro e l'accoglienza del personale.

title: Great value
text:
I was very happy with this room I reserved on Hotels.com. My first time using the site and this room did not disappoint! 
Close to GC and the express bus to the airport. Comfortable bed, great water
pressure in the shower. Large enough as not to feel boxed in like lots of other NYC hotels. I was concerned when I saw my room was across from the elevator but I must say I did not hear any noise whatsoever!  The guest floor with a great coffee bar and snacks along with a nice happy hour was a bonus I had not anticipated. The hotel has a nice affiliate restaurant that delivered room service quickly and was very tasty!  I was so happy that there was a yoga mat in the room and  yoga videos on the TV- I have been suffering with back pain and needed the early morning and late night yoga stretches  without having to find a class while visiting. 
I have nothing at all to complain about with this choice - and have already recommended to others. I will definitely stay here again when back in NYC

title: Great Location
text: Close proximity to most of the good restaurants and fast food places. In house restaurant is very good. The Club Quarters lounge area in the top floor is excellent. Great lattes and breakfast bars in the morning and wine/snacks in the evening to unwind.

title: Extra Miles
text: This hotel is everything the description says it is...conveniently located with huge walk ability factor, wonderful hotel perks like free Happy Hour wine, free snacks all day and a spacious 27th floor terrace for communal lounging.  Our room was compact and efficient and still roomy enough to navigate 2 BFF's (shopping/make-up/hair stuff!).  Mainly, I want to thank and compliment John, the overnight manager for going way above to help us with our check in/boarding passes when the printer went on the blink, and also Jillian & Cenny for being so gracious, funny, and friendly.  We were there to see Hamilton on Broadway and these 3 exemplified the beauty of New Yorkers!

title: Nice stay!
text: Was perfect for what I needed. Service was good. Room was good...quite, cool and clean. Good value for the price! Just stayed the night. Had an event in the city and needed to leave early the next morning.

title: Can't ask for anything more
text: As lovely a hotel as you could ever want. My first stay there was the first week it opened. Not even the lobby had been completed; nor the comfortable lounge on the 27th floor. And still, I knew this place was special. The rooms are spotless; the service, outstanding; the opportunity to relax and enjoy coffee and snacks in that top floor lounge, comforting; the location, ideal. And the reception that you receive as you enter makes you feel like you've lived there all your life. Jillian's warm, bubbly but sincere personality welcomes you as soon as you enter and Tre's smile and more reserved but ever so endearing demeanor makes you feel so comfortable after a lengthy, tiring travel experience. You know that their offers to assist you with anything you need are genuine. It's the best way I can think of to start off my stay in the Big Apple. It goes without saying I can't wait to return. My idea of perfection.

title: Good location but don't expect much for the interior
text: Good location and polite staff made up for the shortcomings otherwise might rate lower. The aircon is noisy and the lift broke down twice in a week causing the waiting time for the lift to be long. And lift buttons somehow weren't always working, seen it happened to many other guests too.

title: Elizabeth is a supper star
text: My trip was amazing because of Elizabeth without her I would’ve never had such a great experience!, with such servitude and reliability she really care about the guest ! The hotel needs to keep this jewel.

title: Fab stay in a great location.
text:
We stayed in a superior room with kitchenette this was great. The facilities in the room were excellent and we didn’t have any major issues. The air con is a little noisy however it does mask the noise of the traffic etc. No room safes just a common room that staff give you access to. 
The lounge was a great service and very handy. Wine hour 5-6pm was fab!
We would definitely stay here again as the location was fab and the facilities were perfect for a city break.

title: Quick trip
text: This was an overnight trip for me - great location for access to all of central NYC. K=Lots of restaurants in all price points within walking distance.  I live in the Tri-state region and often come in for overnights (business and pleasure.)  Will definitely stay here again.

title: perfect location
text: We were strongly satisfied in this hotel. It is small but comfortible, we aprociate good price. There is a nice terrace on the roof, you could owerviev streets near to you and the life on Manhattan. Recommend it.

title: Exceeded Expectations
text:
This hotel exceeded my expectations! I was definitely hesitant after reading some reviews, but my worries were cast aside when I arrived. Jillian and Greg welcomed me when I checked in and never ceased to give me great food recommendations and places to go. 

The only thing I wish could’ve been improved upon was the air conditioning unit in the room. It was very noisy and I had trouble adjusting the room temperature.

title: Great Hotel
text: My fiend and I booked and overninght stay at the Club Quarters Grand Central.  WE found the staff very helpful and the room very pleasant and spacious.  We agreed the price was very reasonable and  was centrally located near many restaurants and other food places as well as Broadway. We will definitely come to Club Quarters again and highly recommend it to all our family and friends.

title: Great visit
text: We had a few drinks at the Bistro bar and got great customer service from Ricardo - he is usually in on weekends but we were lucky to have him at the bar on a Tuesday. Plan to visit the quiet yet fun place again

title: First business trip to NYC, glad I picked this hotel!
text: Be sure to download their app. It makes check-in a breeze! Snacks are available at all times, self-service laundry and fitness room are also available. The proximity to Grand Central Terminal is very useful.

title: NYC July 2019
text:
Compact and functional room which is well maintained and clean.
I just like the look and feel. 
Friendly helpful staff. 
27th floor has a terrace and tea and coffee if you don't want to sit in your room. Plus a Happy Hour

title: High expectations low reality
text: I chose this location for my birthday to house my girlfriend and myself for a full weekend Friday through Monday. The lady whom checked me us in was a delight but everything that followed was a disaster. The room had a terrible view. The TV internet and Chromecast didn't work. I requested a spoon one night it took forever to get to me and the night before I requested to have the internet and Chromecast working they said they'd send someone up and they never did.  There are no ice machines on any floor except on the top floor and the elevator situation is miserable as there are only three elevators and they use the three main elevators as a freight as well. so even getting to your room sometimes can be a very long wait and trying to get back down to go somewhere and take forever as well. overall I would never stay at this specific location again.

title: Great Value - Great Service - Great Location
text: Hotel seems to be built for the business traveler. The lounge and bottle water service on each floor were great. The room was very clean. I didn't get to try the restaurant on this trip. I'll have to try it on the next one. I'll definitely be back.

title: downtown manhattan
text: The lounge was filled with groups doing business (even during the cocktail hour).  It was not very relaxing.  The room was nicely maintained, but the sink was partially clogged and barely drained. Elevators ran on key cards and this did not work very well.

title: First Time Stay at CQ Grand Central
text:
I always know what to expect from CQ in the way of great location, amenities, service, and overall value for the price paid.  I ALWAYS look for CQ FIRST whenever travel planning will take me to a city with a major downtown location.  Special shout out to Greg for giving consistently good advice, directrions, and excellent overall service.  

Two improvement items for this property:  water pressure for the shower and assuring there is early morning staffing for "Living Room".

title: Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central
text: Hotel very clean and customer focus. Lot of facilities and location was very good ( close to Grand Central)  if you want to visit Manhattan by foot, metro. 15 minutes from all nice places like Times Square, Chrysler building, Empire State and the fashion avenue.

title: A good choice in New York
text:
I've shared my views in the preliminary screen. Why am I being asked again to submit my review?
This is definitely a very poor use of my time, and I highly recommend that you adjust your processes to reflect this.

title: Convenient location - Grand Central across the street
text:
Location was great, reasonably priced and your clerks at the front desk were very helpful. 

I was charged a deposit for each night on top of the room charges, but was told it would be refunded when I checked out ... 5-7 days.

title: Club Quarters is the Place to Stay
text: I never stayed at Club Quarters but I decided to give it a try.  I absolutely loved it and will definitely stay again.  Everything was excellent!  I liked the fact that they provided water for the guests and a yoga mat if you chose to workout in the room.  Although the room was small, it was well thought out.  I did have an issue with the television - however - someone promptly came up to my room to take care of it.  Staying at this hotel made my short stay in NYC a great one.

title: Perfetto
text: Posizione strategica, sala panoramica at the top perfetta per godere di break pomeridiani con merende e aperitivi pianificando cosa fare in serata nella magnifica NY....consigliato a coppie e famiglie

title: Koselig hotell👍🏻
text:
Hotellet ligger sentralt til. Veldig bra rengjøring👌🏼
Kaffe, te, vann og litt forskjellig snacs er alltid tilgjengelig på 27 etasje.
På ettermiddagen er det fint å sitte på takterrassen og ta et glass glass vin, som jo selvsagt er gratis.

title: Outstanding Service
text: I stay here occasionally on business, and am always impressed by the very friendly and attentive staff. The combination of location, excellent customer service, and clean comfortable accommodations make this a winner and I look forward to the next trip to NY. A big plus is the the complimentary happy hour on a high floor (if you’re lucky Jillian is serving!) with an incredible view.

title: Facilities fee for amenities advertised as ‘free’
text: Room was okay, hospitality was fine. My qualms are with the facilities fee, which reception said are for “wifi” and other amenities that are advertised in the hotel and on booking sites as ‘free’. The facilities fee is mentioned during the booking process - so fair enough, but don’t advertise things as FREE when it isn’t and you’re paying a pretty hefty price for them at the end of your stay.

title: Elizabeth is  spectacular
text: The service was amazing! This is my second stay with the chain. Elizabeth made my stay so comfortable! She is an amazing asset to the hotel! Guests should feel privileged to have her assist them! Kudos!

title: Excellent
text: We loved the room , the location. It was great to have bottled water and snacks . The only reason for the 4 is that the ac was dripping and making the carpet wet and the management did not take care of it  before we left.

title: Good value
text: Great central location with easy access to most that the city has to offer.  Be clear, this is a high class dormitory, not a full service  hotel but for most travellers who might prefer to choose where they eat and drink it's a great, well priced solution.

title: Fab hotel!
text: What makes this hotel truly great, is it’s staff, we had arrived as a surprise for my father’s 60th, the hotel staff went out of their way to make sure the surprise was kept, the reception staff were amazing and it felt like they were just as excited as us, we would definitely stay here again, service here is amazing, the view from our room was also pretty awesome!

title: OVER PRICED
text: This hotel is over priced for the services provided.  Additional charges for the supposedly free wine hour on the roof.  Hidden charges added to bill when checking out in the very small lobby with guests with luggage waiting for elevators, checking out and checking in.

title: Poor room
text: Room on the 4th floor with blinded windows and a large noisy aircondition unit outside. Airconditioning unit inside the room was very loud. The room was further on dampy and due to that a bit smelly..

title: Would return to CQ!
text: Location of hotel is perfect and service was great by the staff! They are willing to accommodate to request. Cleanliness of room is there unless you are super particular about it. Would return to CQ chain again!

title: Excellent service
text: the room was big enough for 2 persons. clean. personnel were very friendly and helpful. Always smiling and assisting in any query. we stayed there for 10 days and everything was great. they have a "open wine"from 5 to 6.

title: Loistava paikka
text: Hotelli on loistavalla paikalla, helppo kulkea kävellen kaupungin nähtävyyksiinkin. Hyvä aamiainen , valinnan varaa on. Siistit huoneet, sujuva palvelu. Tänne varmaan majoitumme toistekin, hintataso on kuitenkin kohtuullinen.

title: Excellent location and staff
text: I visited with my sister for 3 nights and it was amazing. The staff is extremely helpful and nice. Great location a few blocks from Grand Central Station, so it is easy to move around. There are snacks in the 27th floor, enough for breakfast, generating a space to socialize with other guests and feel at ease.

title: Great vale, great location
text:
Perfect location for getting around Manhattan and other areas on NY.
Great rooms.
Free happy hour drinks and snacks on 27th floor, between 1700-1800 hrs.
Very clean.
Staff very helpful and attentive.
Our room was spacious, considering where the hotel is.
Grand Central station is literally the other side of the road.

title: Great location and staffs
text:
First time to NYC, hotel is in a great location if you want to be in the thick of it. The staff were amazing especially Greg and Elizabeth. We will definitely be back again. 
Good times thank you NYC!😊

title: Pride Getaway
text: Booked as a " blind" choice on a travel website, I knew the location would be great ( across the street from Grand Central ) but didn't expect the level of service and conveniences available.  A 27th floor " living room" with outdoor terrace and comp snacks 24hours, daily " happy hour" with wine at 5pm, great restaurant located in same building that gave 15% off for hotel guests ( Davio's is it's name), pleasant and KNOWLEDGEABLE  staff, decor etc...I will reccomend highly...

title: A wonderful place that will not disappoint you.
text: There was so much to enjoy about the Club Quarters in NYC. I was extremely pleased with the staff, service, room, and the happy hour on the 27th floor was definitely a wonderful experience that turned into one of the highlights of our stay at the hotel.

title: Suite con uso cucina....che furbata!
text: ....me lo dico da solo che sono stato furbo, in verità avendo figlio che mangia poche cose molto italiche tipo pasta e olio (....)... mi trovo costretto a cercare hotels con uso cucinino. In questo caso devo dire che fare un pasto al giorno in hotel alla fine é stata soluzione gradita a tutti. Spesa al Grand Central market o anche se un pò più distate da Jacks, suite con doppio locale non diviso, vista fantastica sulla Lexington. Ottimo in tutto, qualche presa non funzionante ma abbiamo supplito con le altre.

title: Comfy cozy
text: Friendly staff, quiet, free Wifi, few blocks walking from Broadway and Times Square, easy check and check out. Key card for everything from room to elevator, lot of shopping available. bed was comfortable, spacious for NYC hotel room!

title: Plan on coming back!
text: This hotel is literally across the street from Grand Central station. It is withing walking distance of Times Square, the Promenade and the UN. What you cant walk to you can take the subway too. Great places to eat within a block or 2. The Staff was great with help on which subways to take and where. In room free coffee! Smart TV you can either use your phone on or use your own amazon or Netflix accounts.

title: Nice hotel for a business trip
text: I stayed at this hotel for 4 nights on a business trip. The rooms are basic but very clean and a good size. The check in / check out was quick and efficient. The 24 hour gym is small but has good equipment and there are also yoga mats and bands available in the room.

title: Not worth as AC doesn’t work properly. It was impossible to stay in the room with it turned on.
text: Not worth. The AC was too noisy, I asked them 3 times to fix it and the problem wasn’t solved. The nice things such as snacks and wine are not worth if simple things are not working, such as AC working properly

title: Really was not impressed
text:
The good: Clean, friendly and accommodating staff, extra effort all around
The bad: Mis-sized toilet seats that won't stay up, hard uncomfortable bed, outlet next to bed not working (multiple calls to fix), no refrigerator in room

title: Hôtel très bon emplacement
text:
Hôtel très bien situé  la chambre  propre et assez grande    Salle de bain propre douche italienne
Grand point positif au 27 étages tous les matins petit déjeuner (barres de céréales, boissons chaudes et fruits frais) et le soir Apéro offert     une grande terrasse très appréciable  
Personnel très agréable disponible et très gentil  Merci à Sandy, Jillian, Rey, Grey et Pete
Le seul point négatif sera la climatisation trop bruyante et peut-être revoir l'insonorisation des fenêtres
Hôtel que je conseille car situation géographique  très bien (face à Grand Central)

title: Elizabeth is Ahhh-mazing!
text: Our trip at Hotel Boutique was fabulous, and we owe it all to Elizabeth! She has the best energy and was so willing to make sure our trip was nothing but the best. We will absolutely be back and we can’t wait to see Elizabeth. Thank you!!!

title: Missing Chris
text: OMG!!! I am up on 27th floor for wine at 5:00.  As usual, I’m here almost all weekends.  One of the biggest pleasures was having Chris here hosting wine at 5.  We loved him and all the other guests loved him.  To just now find out he is no longer with CQ is a big disappointment.  A HUGE disappointment!!!   Whomever made the decision to let him go, made a very bad decision.  A very bad customer relation decision.  Did any of you ‘decision makers’ ever see him in action?  If not, that was mistake #1.  You all made a truly bad corporate decision here.  He was a valued employee here in your guests opinion and someone really screwed up.  Shame shame.

title: Terrific Hotel Perfect in every way!
text: Completely enjoyed my stay there. Staff was great room was clean and cozy. Location was perfect. The price was the correct one. I had a great time there. Bed was really comfortable. Close to shopping and good restaurants.

title: Awesome Hotel!!!
text:
We were in NYC for a wedding and stayed for 6 wonderful nights! We would highly recommend this hotel!!! It’s in a great location so it’s walkable to many areas.
It was fantastic from the warm and friendly staff (especially David Scott who always made a point to acknowledge you with a friendly gesture) to the room to amenities the hotel has to offer! 
We were greeted warmly at check in and were upgraded to a bigger room on the top floor! It was awesome!!! 
Thank you, CQ Grand Central for a fabulous stay! We’ll definitely be back!!!

title: No drama, but all you need
text: CQ gives you what you expect from a hotel without any negatives or surprises. It is clean, reliable and comfortable. The service is professional, efficient, reliable and friendly. Their formula delivers a comfortable and relaxing experience without any negative drama. The lounge, with its amenities and snacks is an added benefit.

title: never again
text: disorganized front desk, bad lighting in room, photos are not accurate, community iron in hallway, carpet was stained and sheets had pulls and tears in them the bed was comfortable and the location was excellent. TV didn't work and the seating area was very uncomfortable and hard to work on (table was bolted to floor)

title: Ottima posizione e gran bel terrazzo
text:
Posizione ottima per chi è a Manhattan per turismo, all'angolo fra la Lexington e la 45ma, a due isolati dal Chrysler Building e 10 minuti a piedi da Times square.
La nostra stanza (una tripla al 16mo piano) era grande (con una televisione enorme, per chi può averne interesse). Anche il bagno era grande, ma a mio avviso con due difetti: la tenda e non il vetro nella doccia (il che mi è sembrato assai strano in un 4 stelle) e la presenza di un antibagno con lavandino non separato dalla camera, per di più con unica luce rispetto al bagno (in sintesi: se accendi la luce del bagno, illumini anche la camera). Altra pecca, ma questa è cosa comune, la moquette nella stanza. Comuqnue la pulizia era molto buona. Il servizio, dopo una piccola incomprensione iniziale dovuta al fatto che non era stato preparato il terzo letto, s'è dimostrato all'altezza.
Ottimo plusvalore il rooftop al ventisettesimo piano, "all'ombra" del Chrysler Building, con caffé e acqua a disposizione gratis 24/24 e vino offerto dalle 17 alle 18. E' possibile lasciare gratuitamente i bagagli dopo il ceck out, nel caso in cui si abbia l'aereo tardi.

title: Absolutely Amazing
text: I had given up at writing these reviews until my stay here at the Club Quarters Grand Central.  I have been staying here a few times a month for work and can not say enough amazing things.  The evening front desk staff go above and beyond to accommodate and make you feel welcome.  The rooms are always clean and quite and are designed well.  The rooftop club room is excellent for a great cup of coffee and views of the city.  I will try to come here as much as I can while here on business.

title: Great for Business Travelers
text: The hotel had everything you would hope for to be comfortable on a business trip. I upgraded to Standard Room to have a little more space, which was definitely worth it. There were light snacks during daytime hours with fruit and granola bars at breakfast. The only complimentary food/bev amenity available all day was the coffee (which was great!) The hotel is clean, comfortable, has great internet, and is efficient. Also, the 5-6 p.m. free wine happy hour was great! Chris, the hotel staff member who facilitated the happy hour, is awesome. He made it a good time and got folks talking with each other. I would stay there again!

title: Beware the hidden  charges
text: They charge $30 a day extra for use of amenities on departure that you have no choice over or knowledge of in advance. pretty crappy behaviour. The staff are pleasant enough but the rooms are pretty small

title: Nice economical stay
text: Nice hotel one block from Grand Central. Clean, new, nice marble shower. Small room but not unusual for New York standards. Relatively cheap, got a room for $350 when everything else in the area was four to five hundred. No frills, no minibar no restaurant on premise although there's a third-party restaurant that does room service. Happy hour with wine for everyone on top floor. Good spot for business.  I don't think any work out facilities, but I'm not sure. Friendly staff.

title: Disappointing stay, the worst customer service
text:
We booked a room with kitchenette and expected great things based on previous online reviews and the price per night. First impressions were ok, friendly staff and we were checked in right away. It appeared our request for a room on a higher floor was accommodated as we were put in 1904. The room had some definite wear and tear, and large water marks on the ceiling areas.  Whatever, no drips, we didn't say anything about it. Quiet except for the sound of neighbour's door slamming and extremely loud AC (though it effectively cooled the room, so pro con). 
All seemed well but on the fourth night of our stay water started pouring from a vent in the ceiling onto our living room floor. Thank goodness we were in the room and were able to put a garbage can under the drip. When we called reception, they sent someone up to look but said their repairmen would not return til the next day. When we asked if any other rooms were available, they only offered a lower grade room on the second floor due to 'availability of room types'; a room on the 17th floor was promised to us the next day. To us, either a same or better grade room should have been offered to compensate.  So we slept through the night with the dripping. Then, when it came time to move us, we were then told the room would be on the 15th floor, not 17th. Clearly they gave the room away. Maybe not a big deal in any other city, but for light sleepers in NYC, not the greatest. Still, we sucked it up and were determined not to let it ruin our trip. The clincher came when we checked out and were told by reception that "we were good" and had no outstanding charges. A week after arriving home, we noticed a charge for $150 or so on my visa. An email to the hotel asking what it was for said it was for room taxes, and that our third party booking site should have informed us, and that it wasn't their responsibility to do so on checkout! Appalling. To future hoteliers, I hope you use this as a case study in what not to do.  Shame, as the location is convenient. Pick a different hotel!

title: Top Drawer
text: Everything about the room and the facility was top notch. The room was excellent with good lighting, a fine desk and chair to work and everything handy. The TV worked and was easy to use. The bathroom was perfect ... everything within easy reach and all the essentials available. Good shower, as usual.

title: Algo caro, pero buena ubicación
text:
-Como todos los hoteles en Manhattan, es muy caro en relación al servicio ofrecido (casi USD 200 la noche por una habitación pequeña y sin desayuno)
-La ubicación es lo que lo hace tentador: para una estadía corta, de 2-3 días, permite acceder a varios sitios de interés en Manhattan caminando. Para estadías mas largas, en las que uno sale a explorar sitios mas lejanos de NY en metro, este beneficio se diluye, ya que se encuentran hoteles mucho mas económicos, a un par de estaciones pero fuera de Manhattan (en LIC por ejemplo). Las cercanías en si no son agradables de noche. (no es inseguro, pero no es de las zonas mas animadas)
-El check in fue rápido (pero me parece excesivo el depòsito de garantía de 470 USD).El Check out demoró bastante por las 2 personas que estaban atendiendo previamente.
-El vino de cortesía de las 17 hs es un momento ameno, en el piso 27.
-Los scnacks y gaseosas de cortesía están disponibles de 10 a 20 hs.
-La habitación pequeña es cómoda y funcional. Al no poder abrir las ventanas, se depende del aire acondicionado, que es ruidoso, para poder ventilar/ refrescar.

title: Wish we could have stayed longer
text: We really enjoyed our 2 nights at this hotel and wished we could have stayed longer. Our standard room was very nice (minor thing was our room phone hand set wasn’t working but we really didn’t need it). Trey was very nice in finding us a room so we could check in early and would always offer any help whenever we saw him. Chris ALWAYS  greeted us whenever we saw him. He was very entertaining during the 5wine time. We will definitely return on our next NY visit. Our thanks to the wonderful staff who made our visit so pleasant!

title: A well reviewed hotel that dissapoints
text:
I booked this place based on previous tripadvisor reviews and the photos on the CQ website, I now wish I had ignored both as they are so misleading.
This is a hotel so in need of refurbishment, we booked a suite and were given a room on the fifth floor, it was so dark and dingy and only had room for one person to comfortably sit which was crazy. Everything about the room was so dated, the aircon is the noisiest we have experienced and the smell form the sink drain was just over powering, the cracked bathroom sink didn't help either. The Hotel was full so when we requested to move room they couldn't accommodate this and so we checked out, but only after we waited an age for the supervisor who was at home to confirm that the full refund would be given! even then they couldnt release the hold placed on my credit card!

This isnt a hotel that justifies its 4 star rating, after a much needed refurbishment it may do but at this time its an overpriced 3 star business hotel. NYC has far better hotels to spend your hard earned cash in, if you want to ensure a great time give this one a miss.

title: Getaway to NYC
text:
I went to NYC for business for 4 days and transferred to Club Quarters for the weekend after my business was completed.  

Upon arrival I was greeted by David Scott.  I explained I was waiting for my husband and he told me to make myself comfortable in the lobby.  

The check-in process was easy and our room on the 5th floor was comfortable and clean.   We were pleasantly surprised to find out that the hotel had a lounge on the 27th floor which had complimentary snacks, coffee and tea.  I made good use of this area late at night when I had some work to do.  The views from the balcony were also amazing.  It offered lots of seating.  In addition to this, they had a water station close to the elevator. 

David and the team were friendly and made us feel welcomed every time we arrived into the hotel.

I will definitely use this property again and would prefer this property for my next business trip.

title: Ótima estrutura e excelente localização!
text: Ficamos hospedados durante 6 noites em julho de 2018. O hotel tem um serviço rápido de check-in e check-out. Os quartos tem um bom tamanho... não muito grandes mas com tudo de importante funcionando, especialmente o ar condicionado no calor de julho! Todos os andares possuem uma estação com garrafas de água para encher (geladinha!) e no topo do prédio fica um lounge super legal, com refrigerantes, café e alguns snacks para aproveitar. No final da tarde servem vinho no happy hour! No lounge também há algumas mesas, sofás e computador disponível para os hóspedes. Gostamos tanto da experiência que vamos repetir! Daqui a alguns dias voltaremos para mais uma estadia no Club Quarters Grand Central! Além disso, já ficamos em outros da mesma bandeira em outros locais! Recomendo muito!

title: Very good quality for price. Small but comfortable.
text: The hotel is cheap in comparison to others in the area. It is very modern and new. I really enjoyed my stay. And was able to watch Netflix using my account on the room’s tv, which was nice. The furniture is modern, they have keurig machines in the rooms and bottled water available on each floor.

title: Great stay in NYC
text: The Club Quarters was an absolute pleasure to stay at. The location of the hotel gives you quick access to the best spots in NYC including Times Square and beyond. The room was also great. The staff was super friendly and very helpful.

title: Club Quarters Grand Central
text: The location was close to everything that you would want to see in New York, the room was very clean and comfortable and the hotel staff went above and beyond to assist us in every way that they could.

title: Hidden resort fee if you have booked through the third party!
text: I have stayed in this hotel for 4 nights. This hotel is supposedly renovated but in my opinion it is not 100% renovated. You can still feel the tiredness of the room, bedding, tiles, walsl in the washroom. Nevertheless, my husband and I enjoyed this hotel very much due to the location and service(coffee, free laundry and friendly staff), until I came home and checked my credit card statement. There was a charge of USD86. I was dumbfounded and contacted the hotel. According to the hotel it is the resort fee. Once again I found this extremely unreasonable. To avoid the resort fee or any kind of surprise hidden fee, I already have contacted CQ prior to my booking. In fact I have contacted Grand central branch + Wall St branch in NYC.  These two branches of Club Quarters in NYC have confirmed me that there is no resort fee. Since I got the confirmation of no hidden fees by the hotel I went through and booked the hotel. However when I explained this, the hotel simply responded that there is a resort fee if you book through the third party. I found this answer this extremely unjust so I requested him to lift the resort fee. He refused and asked me to contact the manager. Later of the day I have contacted the manager and the manager confirmed again that he could not do anything about this and just reconfirmed that there always a resort fee if booking is done through the third party. As a customer we have a right to know all the exact details to make the reasonable decision. When I was requiring regarding the resort fee before the booking, no staff specified that I need to make a booking through their websites to avoid the resort fee charge! If I have known about this detail, I would not have booked this hotel. But now that I have already stayed and left the hotel they simply charged on my credit card. The hotel should have informed me PROPERLY on the first place the details and terms/conditions of the resort fee! I feel like I have been ripped off for no reason.
