I wouldn't hesitate in coming back to this hotel. The wine at 5 on the 27th floor is a great little bonus, trivia with Chris was fabulous, what a great thing to do to make the hotel feel inviting! 

If you want a great hotel with a fabulous location and the best staff the city can offer, look no further!

title: Succesful visit
text: The rooms were clean and the hotel layout was cool. The 27th floor café is a nice touch.  We probably should have asked for a higher floor as the street noise was a little irritating. Yadda yadda yadda (is that 200 words?)

title: Great atmosphere!
text: My wife and I took our first trip to NYC for 4 days and Club Quarters provided for an excellent place to stay for the visit. Comfy bed, water on each floor, inviting lounge area on 27th floor with free snacks and drinks, and they held our bags both before and after check out, which allowed us to roam the city a little more on both ends of our trip. Excellent place!

title: Beware of Hidden Charges
text: There was a computer glitch that caused the hotel to overcharge me. When I brought it to their attention they insisted they would give me a refund but it's been 1 month now and I still have not had a refund.

title: Great stay for three days in NY
text: The hotel is in a perfect location. The rooms were clean and the front desk staff were so kind and professional. I would recommend this hotel. One draw back was the room was a bit small so if your looking for a larger room look for that at the hotel - they offer larger ones.

title: Welcoming stay!
text: Great stay and view from the room!! The staff was really nice and helpful. Close to 5th avenue, and Grand Central with the subway in it. Comfy beds. Free water bottles in every floor. Every afternoon you can go up to the Club Room and get free snacks and soda. But for this price i expect a clean bathrom - it was halfway done every day, and there was some loose parts in the room when we arrived that should be fixed. That’s the only reason for not topscore :)

title: NY Stay
text: The location was good for my job and the staff that greeted you as you came in off the street were amazing.  I really enjoyed being on the 16th floor and maybe next time I will request an even higher floor.  The one issue I had was that the ceiling vent in the bathroom should be dusted on a daily basis and it was not a pleasant site as it was filthy.  Other then that issue I had a great stay.  Thank you.

title: Home sweet home
text: Exceptionally friendly and highly competent staff,great wi-fi,extremely clean, exceptionally convenient location, very secure place to stay, Davio’s is the best northern Italian restaurant in the Town.

title: Best deal in town
text: Location turned out to be so much better than expected.  Grand Central was only two blocks away and the 7 train whisked us to both the theater district and to the Javits Center (also Hudson Yards) in no time.  Getting across town by cab is impossible.

title: Comfortable & clean basic room
text: Room was clean and conveniently located. No frills, comfortable, clever use of limited space. I’ve always enjoyed staying at CQ, and would recommend this location. Perfect for business travel when you don’t spend a lot of time in your hotel room.

title: Decent hotel
text:
Nice place. Friendly and helpful staff with a very informal attitude that was refreshing.
Room is nice. I particularly like the coffee maker (Keurig), fridge. In addition there are free water stations on each floor and you can simply get an ironing kit on the 3rd floor without having to ask.

title: Great amenities, friendly staff, water pressure could be better
text: I've stayed at this hotel a number of times over the past few years. Great location for my business purposes. The staff is always very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable. The amenities are nice. I may not have realized in years past or maybe it's new but they offer snacks/coffee/soda/water in the lounge on the 27th floor during the day and wine at 5pm. It's a nice bright space to work or relax. I just wish the water pressure in the shower was better!

title: Excellent
text:
Nice rooms, clean, good location, special personnel, mainly Mr David Scott, always there to help.
Large rooms considering NYC, they care a lot about security and privacy.
On the 27th floor they offer snacks, coffee, and sometimes a ( not so good) wine.

title: Again very satisfied
text: It was the third time that I choosed this hotel. I like the neighborhood. The staff is very freindly, the check in and out was quick. The room was - as expected - very clean and comfortable. Beautiful view on the terrace at the 27. floor.

title: Super, perfectly simple, easy, warm, friendly space
text:
The CQ hotels are easy, friendly, not pretentious hotels. The one at Grand Central is a fav. Super clean,cozy, well thought out room spaces. Service is very friendly and the roof space living room for coffee, snacks and local NY wines at 5 is an added and super enjoyable perk. Splendid views and generous staff demeanor makes u feel
Welcome. Great value -we’ve come back many times and will yet again. 
Checked in early with David Scott. He recognized that we had been there before numerous times and he upgraded us to a bigger room with no charge. Even got us in before 3 PM - No big fuss, just a nice perk.

title: De vacaciones
text:
En el mes de Marzo hemos estado en NYC y nos hemos hospedado en es re hotel. 
La ubicación inmejorable, el personal súper atento, servicio de agua gratis embotellada, snaks a las 17h y bebidas gratis, y café y fruta gratis por la mañana. 
Todo un detalle. Las habitaciones es, limpias y espaciosas para pasar una semana cómodamente. 
Lo mejor el servicio, un pero...el no haber estado mas tiempo.

title: Perfect hotel near Grand Central
text: Checking out I thought, "This is a find, I will definitely be back." The next day I discovered I had left my Kindle in the room (and I was back in CA).  Called, they had me send them a mailing label, I received my Kindle a few days later.  Great service, great value, great location, A+.

title: Good place to stay
text: Excellent location, clean rooms, check-out process were hustle free, no delays whatsoever. However, the rooms are small (functional for a few days) but not too much wiggle room. The cupboard is very small but good thing they had a mini-couch in the room which I used to place my suitcase. I was provided with toiletries, clean towel, clean sheets and the beds are big enough. Overall, very good experience.

title: Great stay at Club Quarters Hotel
text: This was a great place to stay. Bed was comfortable. Room was a great size. Staff was very accommodating and friendly. I would recommend this to any family or friend. The price was extremely affordable and the location was great!

title: Excellent stay
text: Greta lodging at a reasonable price (for Manhattan). Room size was ample (again by NYC standards), attractive and comfortable. Location is very convenient - a short distance from Grand Central, subway connections and east side attractions.

title: Fab find in the city
text: Really great place to stay... functional room with double bed and single sofa bed. Huge tv with all the chanels. Fab helpful staff. Water station on each floor with bottles is great. Lovely roof terrace and lounge with free snacks and drinks and wine every evening was great. We had our one year old and it was perfect. Will deffo stay again next time. Location is perfect for everything ☺️☺️

title: My New Choice Hotel
text: Im a frequent NYC visitor from Hong Kong.. Originally I booked it for its proximity to Grand Central bc is Feb & we expect a snow storm  (1 block away from its 44st exit) and for its fair room rate. Upon arrival, shocked & skeptical bc there is no lobby but a large foyer w a couple of Kiosks w a couple of smart looking fellas (good thing). Well, I was put to ease immediately when I was treated with super friendliness and kindness. Graig (Greg) was  helpful and made my stay comfortable. He's like the everything go to guy, helped bring my luggages to my room (bc I hurt my shoulder) and my car bookings, and even lent an ear to hear me rant about my day. The room was modern & clean, with modern bathroom (most vital). Size is small like more NYC rooms and perfect for solo travellers. For couples, may be book a larger room. The  roof top lounge is my favourite,  its where guests hang out with all day complimentary snacks & beverages, use of  computers, simple breakfasts, and free flow wine in the evening. The Wine-server  guy (forgot his name) is so funny, he does a trivia every so often w give-away bottles. It brought the hotel and its residents a little closer. Vice,  no in-room safe,  inconveniently on a separate floor. Summary, hotel may be small, but they made it a special place to stay, a little more than a regular NYC hotel.

title: Lasting Memories
text: My wife chose this Hotel for it's location, little did we know we were choosing quality & service. David checked us in with ease and was extreamly helpful and offered help with our stay outside the hotel. We took advantage of the "wine @ 5" facility with Chris which was a good laugh, Chris knows his job and should be commend as was David. We could pop across the road for snacks & treats (beer) and were only a few clicks from Grand central, Time Square and within awe of the Chrysler building which we could see from our room. We will return and we would definitely choose the Club Quarters Grand central again. Don't think Just book.

title: Great Place Great People!!!
text: Check in was easy.  Room was great.  Wine hour was a blast.  Concierges were extremely helpful and courteous.  I lost my phone in a cab and concierge recovered my phone and returned it to me. Next visit to NY will be at this location.

title: Great Service
text: Rooms are clean and staff very helpful. The location is great if you are attending events at the UN. Nearby restaurants of all types and levels of affordability. Most of the shops of note are also easily accessible. A great place

title: Budget stay
text: If you look for budget place that is it. Very well located close to major atractions of NYC in a walk distance. Also good cafes all around. But if you are concerned with space and full confort forget it. Small rooms, medium shower and noise at night from the street.

title: Excellent place!!
text: The hotel is very clean and the rooms are very big, in general is cozy and the snacks in morning  and wine free in the afternoon at the roof is great. The location its perfect. You going to love it!!!!

title: GCT convenient
text: This is a great business travel location for convenience to Grand Central Station. The rooms are small, but there a top floor hospitality room for breakfast or relaxing at 5 pm. There is also community/work space on the 2nd floor.

title: Good location.  Nice room.  Friendly staff
text:
Stayed for three weeks.  Great location. 
Reasonable price for NYC. Upgraded the room.  Clean rooms.  Access to training and a plus for the lounge in 27th with a very entertaining host.  Will stay there again when I return.

title: Terrific value
text: I have to stay in NYC a few times a year for work. Lately I've been staying at club quarters. The location is perfect, close to grand central terminal, not too far from Times Square, but away from all the hustle and bustle. The staff are nice and friendly. Rooms are clean,may be on small side but maximize the space nicely. The closet, table and seating area, Queen size bed are nice. 27th floor is a lounge, awesome views, coffee, tea and some snacks to enjoy.

title: There staff
text: They have an amazing staff however one , Elizabeth, she was incredible friendly helpful and most of all inspiration seriously she’s gave me a different outlook on my life  🙌🏻her aura is just so uplifting and optimistic she is someone that words cannot describe in general she is someone you want to be stuck on an island with because she will lift your mood she is a people person that’s for sure so if you ever come to club quarters you need to find Elizabeth she will make your stay so much better

title: Great value
text: Good location, safe area, excellent service. Free coffee and fruits at all time, and free wine, snacks and beverages at 5-7pm every evening.  Great space for work and network on 27th floor. 1-min walk distance to Grand Central and 2-min walk distance to subway station.

title: St. Patrick’s Day Fun🍀
text:
I booked this hotel because of its convenient location to the St. Patrick’s Day parade festivities and it did not disappoint. We started our visit by stopping off at the hotel to drop our luggage at 9:30am, knowing that we could not check in until 3. The front desk staff was so accommodating. Surprised that there was no lobby, we asked if there was someplace to freshen up and change our clothes. This is when we discovered the hidden gem of this hotel. The bellman gave us access to the 27th floor lounge where we grabbed some coffee and snacks, used the restroom and regrouped. After a great afternoon at the parade, we arrived back at the hotel for a quick check in at a kiosk and friendly front desk staff who told us our luggage had already been placed in our room and there was a happy hour on the 27th floor from 5-6. Our room was clean, spacious (for NYC) and well appointed. After a quick shower we ventured to the 27 floor and were greeted by an extremely fun and festive atmosphere and our host CHRIS and his team. I am a jaded, former New Yorker and was not expecting to have so much fun at a hotel happy hour! Chris welcomed every new arrival with warmth and humor that immediately put everyone in the room at ease. After a rousing game of trivia that included everyone, we happily stayed behind and met people from around the world. It was St. Patrick’s Day in NYC and we opted to hang in a hotel lounge thanks to the fun atmosphere created by Chris and the rest of the crew. 
I have stayed in a lot of hotels over the years and will definitely be returning to this hidden gem on 45th Street!

title: Terrific!!!
text: La ubicación es comodísima. Las habitaciones lo suficientemente espaciosas para estar cómodo. TIenen inlcuso elementos de yoga y videos en TV para que sigas una clase. En el roof tienes cafe, refrescos y snacks gratuitos. Todos los dias vino de 5 a 6pm (gratis). Y todo el personal (sin excepción) es super amable y entretenido! Chris en el roof hace las tardes muy amenas y Elizabeth es de lo más servicial y encantadora. SUper recomendable este hotel VOlveré seguro!!!

title: Centrally-located and perfect for business trip
text: I spent three nights at this property in March 2019.  The hotel was centrally located and it was easy to get my meetings all over the city.  Nice options for breakfast and lunch within walking distance plus easy access to NYC subway.  The room was small but clean and quiet.  No frills but had exactly what I needed.  The "Living Room" on the 27th floor was a nice spot to meet up with coworkers and have some quiet conversation.  Nice expresso machine and snacks too!

title: Beware Rip Off Charges
text:
I stayed at this hotel from 9-12 March 2019 as a few days layover on the way back from a holiday. I booked for a number of reasons including location and free internet. The reality of my stay was as follows
1) Average sized room with only a shower and no bath. No inroom safe, anon functioning coffee maker and an erratic tv
2) I made one international call at the hotel as I was having a few problems with my mobile phone and had to urgently call my provider. For this one single solitary short call I was ripped off - and there are no other words to describe such a completely outrageous charge - to the tune of $74!!!!!
3) I was also charged a “facilities fee” of approx $21 daily and this apparently was to cover “internet etc” - well so much for your “free” internet huh?

Never before in nearly 30 years of international travel all over the world have I ever felt quite so ripped off by a hotel. New York is full of hotels much better than this - my advice to anyone is stay in one of those hotels and avoid these rip-off merchants like the plague!

title: great hotel!!
text: The hotel was terrific room was clean and well appointed lounge on 27th floor was comfortable snacks always available computers were there if you needed them staff was very nice answered questions always with a smile

title: Bus Trip
text: Chris in the lounge was absolutely amazing. Literally made everyone smile as soon as you walked in for 27th floor happy hour. Made atmosphere so great and would come again just for that daily hours experience. Good location too especially for my offices nearby all within walking distance of time square etc

title: Excellent hotel in the heart of Manhattan
text: What an amazing find. Rooms that had all that you could need and a USB charger next to the bed. The water bottles and refil stations on each floor are a great addition. The 24hour lounge available to all was really lovely, as was the wine hour from 5-6pm. The staff were very friendly and helpful, especially Elizabeth.

title: Club Quarters- Pleasant surprise
text: Nice accommodations, friendly staff, clean hotel, nice lounge, Daily Happy Hour was a nice perk.  Pleasantly surprised with how much I liked this place.  Would definitely return.  If you are on business, CQ has great working spaces.

title: Good location,  nice hotel
text:
Hotel was very close to grand central and subway. Liked the living room on topfloor, with nice view and good coffee and snacks. 
Room was not big but had everything I needed for my trip. Service is good.

title: Best value for money
text: The rooftop is awesome, free snacks, soft drinks, coffee and wine at 5pm. Water stations with water bottles provided on every level, best thing for hangovers. Rooms are spacious and comfortable for New York. Oh and Elizabeth was great!

title: A good place in Manhattan
text:
Easy to park the car in the street on Saturday evening. And free parking the whole Sunday: good point!
Well located, close to the Chrysler building, and walking distance to Times Square. Rooms are big enough and very nice. Bed is comfortable. Staff is always happy to help, very friendly.

title: cozy room
text: Club Quarters is  comfortable and conveniently located at Grand Central Station.  Room is small and cozy.  They have a great lounge on the top floor They offer a selection of fresh fruit and breakfast bars in the morning. The afternoon has snacks and free wine bar every night from five to six in the evening .  I always enjoy the happy helpful staff

title: Excellent accommodation at an excellent price.
text: Every aspect was very good but the free wine served at 5pm daily was the icing on the cake after a long day sightseeing. Though we only made that twice out of six nights it was a nice touch. There were free refillable water bottles on our floor too. I really couldn't fault the hotel.

title: great value hotel
text: I will stay again - nice hotel for the money . great staff, nice and clean decor. room is small but sufficient for business or quick to GCT (across street) and close to get out of town to JFK or LGA. airport. can take easily take train to Penn station for transfer to train or bus to Newark - overall not a fancy or special hotel but great for quick trips where bang for buck is key.

title: A great weekend getaway
text: My husband and I stayed here for two nights.  The location is convenient to Grand Central for the subway and a manageable walk to Times Square and theaters.  The shower was amazing and the bed very comfortable.  We loved having breakfast on the terrace overlooking the city and were pleasantly surprised by the free snacks, wine at 5, and a great coffee machine.

title: Excellent
text: Clean, comfortable and the best price in the area.  I highly recommend this hotel.  Davios restaurant in the basement is also excellent and they deliver to your room.  Ask for a high floor so you can avoid street noise.

title: Great location. All good!
text: Great location super close to the 6 line. Room was clean and quiet. Good accommodations, everything you’d need. Friendly staff. No complaints. Would stay here again. They’re making me write more here so just filler.

title: CQ@grand central
text:
Staff very  helpful at small reception area.
Room was great..fridge  and microwave. Had coffee maker and outside room was ice cold water machine..
Commplmentary  snacks in offer all day on 27th floor

At 5pm each evening was Happy Hour.
Chris  would welcome you and have some  banter..And trivia quiz (this was fun) just  a pity was same banter, same line of chat each night.
He would be great just being not so loud and  a bit more sensitive to people's feelings.  Main comment was"just kidding" Heh I'm Chris..

title: EXCELLENT Long stay in CQ at Grand Central
text:
The service I experienced in this hotel was excellent, staff are very polite and efficient.  There is a genuine willingness to help with any requests and they are immediately dealt with.
The room is great, well equipped and the bed super comfortable.  The upper floors do give good relief from the cars honking!
The hotel is very well located for everything you can imagine subway, trains, buses seconds away.  There is also a great grocery store less than 2 blocks if you dont want to eat out all the time.
LOVED the 27th floor common area with TV, internet, printer, snacks drinks etc
Will definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Would stay here again
text: Great midtown-east location, friendly staff, nice (small) room. One of the better places I've stayed in NYC for that price. The Club Quarters app is very useful too - easy check-in/out, able to use my phone as my room key - very handy.

title: Perfect location
text: Larger rooms that most of 4 and 5* hotels in NYC. I always pick CQ hotels while travelling to NYC. Perfect location just 3 min walk from Grand Central and 10 min from Times Square. They have restaurant at 20th or 30th floor with quite good food. They serve decent breakfast but I usually grab something at the nearby coffee shops or Subway to save few minutes in the morning - which is an option thanks to plenty of such places nearby.

title: One of the best hotel values in Manhattan
text: I typically stay at the Grand Central Station Club Quarters. The hotel  is secure, clean, staff is very friendly and the rooms are very comfortable. Bathroom and shower sizes are very comfortable as well. I've stayed at this location 5+ time over the past 3 months. I cringe when it's sold out and I can't get a room as I know other hotel are double the price minimum. Highly recommend this hotel and location.

title: Muy buena opcion
text:
Una opción estupenda para moverte por Manhattan. La ubicación está muy muy bien, la zona es todo lo tranquila que puede ser muy. Cerca dela estación central, cerca de la 5... muy cómodo para moverte. Las habitaciones muy correctas, limpias y un baño aceptable. El edificio tiene una terraza, creo que en el
Piso 22, muy agradable. Sin duda una buena opción.

title: Sehr zufrieden!
text: Zimmer war sauber und zeitgemäß eingerichtet. Ideale Lage nur 2 min von Grand Central Station entfernt. Wir hatten über Expedia gebucht mit Flug. Würden wir sofort wieder buchen zu diesem Preis. Wir waren über Karneval dort.

title: Join The Club (Quarters)
text:
I was very pleased with my recent visit to CQ Grand Central. and really enjoyed my one night stay. 
It is a very efficient and clean hotel and good value for the cost. I would definitely plan to stay at Club Quarters again soon.

title: Great Location Even Greater Staff!
text: Gentleman at check in was extremely helpful and even offered an earlier check in. Desk staff was friendly and knowledgeable throughout my stay. Room is generous for NYC standards and included a small sitting area to catch up on some work. Rooms were clean and refillable water on every floor. Free wine from 5-7 too which was welcomed after a day on my feet. Great experience all around and great location!

title: Great room but deceiving information from staff
text: My stay was great until the last day. My flight was delayed due to an unfortunate circumstance and needed the room for additional 2 hours. I was told by the check-in desk rep I wouldn’t be charged but later was.

title: Don't stay on lower floors
text: When I first arrived at the hotel i was given a room on the second floor facing Lexington Ave. there was no way I would have been able to sleep in this room given the general traffic noise. The hotel staff were good and were able to move me to a room higher up - this helped a lot with the general traffic noise.

title: Great service Zishan, great functional room!
text:
Zishan was great in allowing me to check-in early since the room was available and provided some helpful tips.  Much appreciated.
Also, the room was very functional as well as clean and spacious (i.e. had areas to put personal things where it made sense in bathroom, table area, kitchenette, etc.).

title: Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central
text: This is a last minute booking.  The room was clean and modern.  There was a  Yoga mat and coffeemaker in the room. Great location, walking distance to grand central. It was a quick and fast check in.  I would try this place again in the future. Good price.

title: Grand Central friendly boutique hotel
text: What a great place to stumble upon, close to the train and Starbucks next door, plus bar and restaurant onsite. Friendly staff, clean modern, well lit rooms, more spacious than most and a good size bathroom. Purified water available on  every floor. This was so easy and inexpensive for a nice NYC midtown area hotel! Will be my go-to from now on.

title: Great customer service Zishan
text: Impecable customer service was appreciated by Zishan.  Zishan changed our room type and was very courteous and professional.  I love t his hotel.  Clean.. Great location and the staff is always helpful. Thank you!!!

title: MAGNÍFICA EXPERIENCA
text:
La ubicación del hotel para mi gusto es simplemente perfecta. Es un hotel que se encuentra muy centrado, en ubicación le pongo 10 porque no le puedo poner más. Tienes todo muy bien ubicado. 
Respecto a la habitación, estuve en la más ''barata'' y pequeña del hotel, y he decir que superó mis expectativas, para ser la más pequeña, no está nada mal de espacio. Si vais en pareja, es perfecto. Las vistas que nos tocó no fueron las mejores, pero eso era lo de menos. Por último en cuanto al hotel, no tengo ninguna queja, lo único que puedo decir malo es que a la hora de hacer el check-in, el recepcionista (no se su nombre) no sabía hablar nada español, por lo que a la hora de explicarme la factura de reserva no pudimos entenderle bien, además, fue un poco frío el check-in con él porque no nos dió ningún consejo de lugar o sitios que visitar o simplemente una bienvenida. Por lo demás, todo perfecto. No nos dió tiempo a subir a la planta 27 para disfrutar de ese café o té, pero como nos gustó mucho la estancia y la ubicación del hotel, seguramente repetiremos en este hospedaje para poder disfrutarlo.

title: Great Employees
text: Room was efficiently laid out. Shower heads are high enough for tall people. The upstairs area is a great place to relax and also has a great view. The staff is great-- David Scott assisted me with a clothes hanger situation and was very accommodating and personable.

title: Good location
text: Great location in NYC. Close to Rockefeller and  Times square. Both just a ten minute walk. Clean and comfy. If you're going to grab coffee, walk down 46th to Gregory's for some of the very best coffee

title: Club Quarters
text: Value for money - great small hotel in a great location next to Grand Central Station, and  I was able to walk to a Show in 42nd Street. Didn't go to the "meet and greet" at 5pm, where you can meet other guests, with free drinks and nibbles. Definitely stsy there again

title: Great Location Close To Everything
text: Great location close to everything. In walking distance to Rockefeller Center and 5th Avenue. Right near Grand Central Terminal. Lots of food options nearby, clean rooms, modern touches, looks recently renovated, and a beautiful common area on the 27th floor.

title: amazing staff
text:
The hotel is very good, but the staff...what a great team! theres a man named Chris, he is so smart, gentle, helpfull and funny. he sound like a mix of owen wilson and seth rogen. 

i will come back for sure!

title: Disappointed
text: We stayed at the Club Quarters, Grand Central. The check in was fine and the room was small but clean... But, we were woken up repeatedly from the subway which shook the room and the garbage truck noises which also woke us up very early in the morning. Also, the mattress was soft and we could feel the coils poking into our backs. We will avolid this hotel in the future.

title: Wonderful Choice
text:
Loved every minute of our stay here. We were impressed with the friendliness of all the staff and especially enjoyed the free wine and snacks every night st 5;00 on the top floor! I think their hotel influencer’s name was CHRIS and he was wonderful...very entertaining especially when we played trivia!
The front desk staff were equally impressive and helped us with all our needs...I feel terrible because I can’t remember their names but they were super...even to the point of waiting with us for an Uber and helping load our luggage into the car on the day we left...February 2 2019 ...over and above in the service department ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: Great service
text: The hotel was clean and the staff was very friendly! Our room was cleaned in a timely manner and food we had ordered out was delivered to our door by the staff! They provide many services including free wine! Wine @5 was by far the best part of the hotel. Chris who runs Wine @5 is hilarious, friendly, and accommodating. I’ve never been offered free wine, trivia, and essentially a comedy show at a hotel. He is what sets this hotel apart from all the rest and made the stay worth it!

title: Wow Chris, what a guy!
text: My wife and I stayed at the hotel for three nights and I must say it was great!  The staff were all friendly and quick to help us out. The room was kept clean and stocked. But the icing on the cake was Wine at Five with Chris, he is the reason I'm writing this review. Chris, man you keep doing you and never change!  The trivia was fun and the wine was great.

title: Great experience with great staff!
text:
Stayed here for 3 nights and had a great experience with the hotel staff. David Scott, Chris and everyone else were all very delightful and friendly to interact with.

Everyone was super helpful in helping us with finding places to visit around the city. We would definitely stay here again.

title: Great stay!
text: We loved this hotel. Great location, nice staff, great living room at 27th floor with snacks and coffee until 8pm. Clean and with everything you need. Possibility to leave luggage after check out and free WiFi. Definitely recommend it!

title: Business & Leisure
text:
I stayed at the hotel from 8-12 February 2019 and really enjoyed the hotel, location, restaurants nearby.
Very busy hotel but you wouldn't know it as check in is quick and smooth.
No breakfast restaurant on site but don't let this be a negative as area surrounded by excellent breakfast/brunch locations. Shout out to he Barber across the road who gave me my best cut yet on a Sat morning and a great chat as well!

title: Great location
text:
I stayed 3 weeks as i was visiting my daughter and wanted to be near grand central which was great. They gave me a good room with coffee maker fridge and microwave.  Only down side was i was woken not ones but twice with the fire alarm going off. The wifi didnt work one day either. Hot water sometimes took a while to come through on the shower. One day i came back and there was a smell of drains in my room,but didnt last.
I think great for short stays.

title: Great Experience
text: My wife and I arrived at Club Quarters from Maine, not knowing what to expect.  As it turned out, it was a great 4 days.  When we registered and on subsequent days, Ashley was super helpful as were Rey, Jililan, Chris and others.  The room was clean and the snacks on the 27th floor were varied and wonderful.  On a couple of occasions, Elizabeth and Pete were helpful with the snacks and other amenities.  It was a positive experience and we would have no problems staying there again.  Super positive.  Only negative, we sometimes had difficulties using our room/pass key to run the elevator.  Other than that, 5 stars!!!

title: Club Quarter NYC Stay
text: Great Happy Hour - Chris is very engaging and entertaining. The restaurant in the basement is also delicious. Rooms are right-sized for business overnights and the front desk staff is very courteous and helpful.

title: Can’t beat the fun wine happy hour!
text: The hotel has a happy hour every evening for an hour up in the top (27th) floor. Chris, the host, is warm, funny, and very entertaining! The hour has both red and white wines, fruit, snacks, sodas, and a great view of the area. But it’s Chris that’s makes the hour a fun time!

title: Friendly staff with clean comfortable rooms
text: Lovely helpful staff, great amenities, would definitely stay there again. Excellent location for site seeing. Happy hour was great fun with Chris! All added to the New York experience. Didn’t try the hotel restaurant as it look above our budget

title: EXCELENTE
text: Excelente escolha! Ótima localização, bem próximo ao Grand Central Terminal. É possível ir a diversos pontos turísticos a pé. Água disponível nos corredores, snacks e vinhos oferecidos ao fim do dia no rooftop, vista maravilhosa! Equipe eficiente, quarto impecável! Recomendo e voltaria certamente.

title: Long Weekend
text: We picked CQ Grand Central and we were super impressed with the hotel and the staff. The hotel's location was very conveniently located just a block away from Grand Central station and walking distance to a number of sites. The check-in process with David Scott was super quick and he was wonderful. We felt so welcomed! The happy hour on the 27th floor was an amazing bonus. Chris who hosted the happy hour and trivia was nothing short of hilarious. He totally knew how to work the room and the audience! We LOVED Chris!!! Even before/after trivia, he stuck around and socialized with us which was so nice. He provided us with a few amazing dinner recommendations which were amazing. Overall, we had an amazing stay thanks to the wonderful staff (David and Chris, especially!!!)

title: Nice Accomodations in a Great Location
text: Staff was friendly and accomodating.  Room was on the small side but plenty adequate for my wife and I.  It was clean and well appointed.  The hotel was in a great location, less than a block from Grand Central. Would definitely stay here on a future visit.

title: Good location but a bit short on advertised amenities
text:
We enjoyed our stay at Club Quarters hotel. however their advertised and hyped 'snack room' was seriously lacking. The three times we visited it was just a couple of apples and empty drink fridges and some coffee machines. 

A plus was the option to have the refillable waterbottle on each floor. While still plastic, we liked the ability to fill our own as much as we needed. Great touch.

Good location, good place. OK on price and rooms are a bit small, even by NYC standards.

title: Family visit
text:
Hotel in a great central location. Good  value and offered key facilities and services for both business and  family travel. Very clean and well laid out rooms. Good Smart TV and Channel selection able to connect with phone and computer and work table.
Attentive stafff

title: great perks
text: overall, I enjoy staying at this location. However, getting staff at night to answer the front desk phone is frustrating. Not even a machine to state you have reached the front desk etc. Additionally, the hotel should let you know when the free snacks are available. Only found out after the fact that most are removed after 8PM

title: club quarters
text: good price - tiny room - good happy hour, but happy hour would be better if the bartender didn't ask everyone over 60 if they had an ID.  His patronizing jokes got old very quickly.  It would be helpful to have basic amenities in the room such as a fridge to save tomorrow's lunch.

title: Cozy
text: I love Club Quarters feels so comfortable,everyone is so friendly.I love the filtered water free on demand and the lounge access with coffee,tea,snacks and refreshments and a fantastic view.Its a place to fully relax or go social or even do some business as you totally wish!

title: Fantastic trip to New York
text: Excellent location once we found our bearings realised that most of the attractions were on our doorstep. This has been a fantastic experience and the hotel has made it even better as of its  location The happy hour between 5 and 6 was brilliant as you can meet different people.

title: Experiencia muy satisfactoria!!!
text: Muy buen hotel. Situado en una zona súper buena. Muy buenos servicios: snacks, café, refrescos y vino de cortesía, amenities en la habitación, un cuartito en cada planta con planchas para ropa y cápsulas de leche, costureros, gorros de ducha, cubiertos desechables, zona de gimnasio, lavandería, y servicio de consigna muy seguro para poder dejar el equipaje algunas horas. En general me ha encantado. Las habitaciones son tal y como se muestran en las fotos. Terraza muy bonita para subir a desayunar o merendar. Todo el personal ha sido muy amable. 3 ascensores con muy buena disponibilidad, son rápidos y en pocos segundos vienen. El relaciones públicas Chris nos ha brindado una atención excelente, dándonos información sobre locales y sitios para conocer y pasarlo bien. En definitiva, lo recomiendo muchísimo y repetiría sin dudarlo

title: love love love!!!
text: i absolutely LOVE this hotel. the location, the set-up, and most of all, the staff!!! the amazing staff, from check-in to housekeeping to the awesome trivia at happy hour. i’ve had a great time every time. always looking forward to my next stay here!

title: Great little staycation!
text: My wife and I took stayed here for two nights as a little getaway from the kids. We had a blast! The staff was extremely helpful, especially David Scott and Wilkin. The year-round terrace on the 27th floor had amazing views! The only drawback to the hotel was there aren't any refrigerators or microwaves in the rooms. But I will gladly stay here again. Awesome staff!!!!

title: Great Stay
text:
Rey, the guest manager made our trip so comfortable.The check in 
was a breeze.The location seems perfectly located and convenient to everything. The room has great views of New York City. It should be tried.

title: 5pm Wine Down
text: Besides the chic atmosphere, a real highlight is the wine happy hour at 5pm. Just make sure to show up on time because seats go quick. One day we had Chris spice things up with the trivia; it was a real good time. Today is David, keeping things cool with some great jazz. All in all, a great place to retreat to after a full day in the city

title: Nice boutique hotel
text: Checked in quickly in the small reception. The location is wonderful, surrounded by lots of restaurants and bars and close to the grand central market which is a nice place to see and walk by. The size of the room is average to Nyc standards. there is a coffee machine and nice size bathroom and shower. The bed is quite small for a couple, smaller even from a queen size bed which is uncomfortable. I liked the little bonuses in this hotel like the lounge in the 27 floor - every evening from 5 PM, there is a free wine and other drinks and snacks and you can have a seat in the terrace overlooking Manhattan which is beautiful. The only unpleasant experience was the alarm that went off suddenly at midnight and caused us some stress and was very spooky, we woke up because of it - apparently someone open certain door in the hotel and smoked and it cause the alarm to start working.. too bad because without this incident the total review would have been better.

title: Great location Great Staff - Happy Hour Trivia
text: We chose Club Quarters because the location - two blocks to Grand Central Station and a short walk to Times Square and Theaters for plays.  Great welcome by staff and through out the hotel.  A pleasant surprise was the nightly happy hour and trivia by Chris in the club lounge on the top floor.  He made this a must each night.  He remembered everyone's name each night and helped two different groups celebrate birthdays.  And thanks to Zishan took care of us after our flight was canceled and we returned to the hotel.  He also provided some great choices for a Sunday night dinner as we extended our stay.

title: Convenient and nice
text:
About 200 meters from Grand Central Station.
Much better than expected. Fine room. Snack and lounge on 27th is nice and quiet. Drinks and many kinds of snacks. 
Guest service personnel was very helpful. 
Not far from Empire State Building and Times Square. But also perfect if you plan to go by trains and subways.

title: Hotel boutique at Grand Central
text:
Lovely hotel perfectly situated fir getting around NYC
Staff friendly and very helpful and the hotel was spotless
Considering it’s location we had no trouble sleeping and bed was super comfy
Great views from 27th floor lounge and free wine!!!

title: Great Location.
text: Loved visiting the rooftop- coffee wine the snacks felt right at home. Great place to sit, enjoy the view and take pictures. Loved Chris’s trivia fun! Zishan visited, answered our questions about the city.

title: Nice Business Hotel
text: This hotel is very conveniently located and the service of employees was extremely good. The rooms were a little small, but very nicely laid out. Anyway, you can’t expect to have spacious rooms in NYC, unless you pay the price for the same. It was really good value for money.

title: Neat hotel, top choice in Manhattan.
text:
I stayed before at the Club Quarters Hotel in Boston a few years ago and I was gladly surprised by the quality. There are 4 CQ Hotels in Manhattan and I chose Grand Central because of the price and location. I have to say the hotel stands for the quality of the brand, since this is a very neat hotel with a great location in Manhattan. It’s close to Grand Central Station, the Chrysler Building, the 5th and Times Square. 

The hotel is very clean. I got the basic room and I was surprised with the size, it is small but actually bigger than the standard hotel room in Manhattan. Bathroom was clean, shower was great and the staff is very friendly and helpful. Be sure to check the Club Living Room and have a glass of wine for free on the happy hour, also some snacks and a great view of the city. The free water bottles, online check-in and key room on your mobile is a great plus.

Overall, CQ Grand Central is one of the top choices to stay in Manhattan at a reasonable price for what you get. If you are traveling to Manhattan this hotel is definitely worth to check out.

title: Good value for the price!
text:
Clean, good space, free coffee and good common areas. Friendly staff. I took the room with an extra armchair, that room has a bit more space. 
Nice bathroom. The price was very good and it would have been possible to stay with a small family doing NY

title: Perfect for my needs in Midtown
text: This was my first stay at CQ, and I was very satisfied with the staff, room cleanliness, hospitality and convenience. It was close to where I needed to be and staff were very accommodating. I generally love boutique hotels, but this particular one has some very interesting touches. I also like the reusable water bottles on every floor.

title: Angenehmer Aufenthalt
text:
Hotel ist gut gelegen und Personal sehr freundlich. Special thanks to Rey!

Alles hat super gepasst und die Zimmer haben eine gute Grösse. Bei Buchung ein höher gelegenes Zimmer anfragen, dann hat man eine super Aussicht.

title: Fab hotel would definitely recommend!
text: We couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay. Brilliant location, room was immaculate (upgraded as it was hubby’s special birthday.) Water stations handy, free snacks/soft drinks on the 27th floor lounge, wine at 5 was brill, quiz with Chris, lovely guy (Christine & Steve aka Phil say hi!) Good job we had the free wine as alcohol is super expensive in NYC! Felt very safe in the hotel as the card key is needed to get up in the lift. Cleaner was only used once (our choice) & was great the room smelled amazing after she’d been in! I would definitely go back. Only negative is the heating/AC unit was noisy, luckily we didn’t need it on during the night.

title: Making something good even better.
text: We have stayed at Club Quarters many times, and at this location several times in the past few years. Location is convenient to transportation, tourism, business and general access to many of Manhattan's highlights (Broadway Theater, Fifth Avenue shopping, UN, and Rockefeller Center to name a few). I would describe this hotel as business meets boutique. Rooms are well fitted with the basics, however, everything one can possibly need is accessible and comfortably laid out. Large televisions, comfortable beds, microwave and coffee maker, and in larger rooms a sofabed and small kitchenette.The key to CQ is their proximity to central locations in cities around the country.Some internationally. We have often been able to check in early if a room is available and staff will store luggage after check out should you want to stay in town. The bonus of this hotel is the lovely high floor lounge and enclosed, heated terrace with great views of midtown Manhattan. The lounge is outfitted with several computers and a printer, snacks including fruit and granola, and a high end coffeemaker - all complementary. There is a lovely happy hour with complementary wine, sodas, coffee and snacks. Today, we returned from our day out to be welcomed by Zishan, the Guest  Service Manager. There was light jazz playing in the background and the atmosphere was calm and welcoming. As a long term patron of the CQ hotels, I have to say this was one of the more welcoming and relaxing visits I can remember. Thanks Zishan for your generous welcome. This type of service is rare in an affordable hotel in Manhattan....making something good even better.

title: Brilliant!
text: This fantastic hotel is tucked away near to Grand Central Terminal. We didn't eat there or use the gym (as if we would!) but we did attend the 5pm wine (and trivia quiz) meet which was fun and the compare did a fantastic job. The hotel provides free wifi as well as use of computers and not only do the rooms have coffee making facilities but there is a communal room where you can help yourself to snacks, fruit as well as coffee and sodas all free. The rooms were clean and soaps and shampoos were provided. The staff were great and a special thank you goes to Elizabeth who is a little sweetie!! Thanks guys we'll be back!

title: Fun Time- Great Location
text:
The check-in  hotel staff was lovely and super friendly. Our room was actually ready early and they had no problem letting us in at 1 vs 3. 
Chris made the happy hour on 27 a fun time with some trivia - it really spurred on some conversation.
We came to go to the theater, so the location was perfect. Lovely time!

title: Супер
text: Очень понравился отель, да комнаты слегка маловаты, но уютные. На 27 этаже есть утром кофе, чай, вода, бананы, яблоки и батончики. На каждом этаже есть автомат с водой. В номерах кофе-машина. Вечером в 17.00 есть бесплатный винный час, красное и белое вино,  также проходит небольшая викторина с Крисом- очень добрый и позитивный работник. Единственное в зимнее время очень сильно дуло от окна и было холодновато.

title: Grateful trip
text: Great location cute decor the staff likes to  play . It was great having a train .receptionist was really helpful . Overall I couldn’t complain about anything . Met some great guys who were great and what a great location

title: Great place, great price
text:
Loved my stay here! Great location, clean room, very safe, loved the happy hour and trivia! Highly recommend! The staff were great! Refillable water stations were awesome! Can’t wait to book
Again! Complimtary snacks very thoughtful

title: Great stay!
text: Very clean, staff very helpful and friendly. Awesome price and location. Loved complimentary happy hour. Yoga Mat in room, great coffee, and snacks. Liked the security of card to use the elevator and nice water stations. Thanks!

title: What a find!
text: This hotel is a hidden gem -- its location steps from Grand Central makes it a great, easy-to-navigate spot. But it's inside that really sets it apart. The staff is welcoming and friendly, the rooms are tidy and clean, and the little unexpected bonuses are delightful. There are reusable water bottles and filtered water everywhere; the snacks and free tea/coffee/sodas on the 27th floor are really lovely; and the 5 p.m. wine hour is a blast. The night we were there, Chris led a pop-up trivia contest while the delicious white and red wine flowed. Add in a great rate, and you'll want to come back again and again. We sure will!

title: A nice new experience!
text: Very clean and nice room, excellent staff, very friendly and helpful. And the young man hosting the wine hour gets ten points!! Easy walk to Broadway, Central Park and Macys. Bryant Park just around the corner.

title: Recommended!
text: This was a last minute booking due to a flight cancellation. I arrived quite early and the hotel was very accommodating in allowing me to check in early. Rooms are slightly dated, but clean and comfortable. Location is excellent if you have business in midtown.

title: Cleanest most space efficient room I've ever stayed in!
text: Room was very clean and comfortable! No complaints what so ever. Coffee machine on 27th was excellent. Staff was friendly and checking and checking out was a breeze. I would recommend this hotel to anyone!!!

title: Great hotel in Midtown.
text: Excellent all around.  Modern, comfortable, some nice lobby perks.  The price (off-season) was exceptional.  The king bed room was perfect for one or two people only.  The location can't be beat for access to every sort of transportation.

title: Wonderful location
text: Couldn’t be more satisfied. Beautiful, clean accommodations for a great price.Needed to travel further north but needed the rest so stayed the night before continuing my trip. Met up with a friend to catch up. Was a wonderful location near all.

title: Robust quality in good location
text: Slightly expensive and spartan hotel but in a great location, convenient and functional, in a neighborhood with available services. Part of a robust chain. Room was small and minimalist but operational.

title: Birthday
text: As always hte Club Quarters does not disappoint.  I took advantage of the 27th floor for hte first time and wonder why i did not go up there in the past.  It was great and good to have some snacks and drinks.  The personnel was great and the room was great too.  I normallly come for business but came with my daughter this time and it was perfect.  Thanks

title: Excellent Hotel and Services.
text: I'm still staying here and my satisfaction level it's very high ! Congratulations to the whole staff and special thanks to Mr. Scott, David (Front Desk) and another RedHead employee (also from Front Desk) which I don't remember his name right now. Keep rocking, guys !

title: Great views, comfortable room
text: The hotel is excellent. The room was comfortable, with a breathtaking view. The hotel restaurant, Davio's Northern Italian Steakhouse is beyond good. The hotel amenities are a plus. I highly recommend Club Quarters for business or pleasure.

title: Great business hotel
text: Excellent location. Service staff very efficient. I needed the volume adjusted on the TV and the technician came in minutes. The penthouse lounge area happy hour is a nice touch and the “influencer” does a nice friendly job of curating the evening. I choose this hotel for every business trip to NYC. It’s (for me) the ideal mix of accommodation (not fancy but clean and contemporary), fair price, and amenities (small but adequate gym, lounge) and location.

title: Grande Experiência!!
text: O hotel é muito bem localizado, próximo à Grand Central Station, que recebe um grande número de linhas de metrô e que te levam para qualquer lugar de New York. O atendimento é ótimo, fomos muito bem atendidos por todos principalmente pelas atendentes Ashley e Jillian, que nos ajudaram muito no nosso check-in e checkout, além de dicas sobre a cidade. O hotel é limpo, o quarto é muito confortável e aconchegante. Recomendo muito!!!

title: Great location, Love, Love, Love!
text:
Chris was fabulous during the happy hour. Loads of fun!  Can’t beat the free wine and snacks during the nightly happy hour. 
Rooms are small (but that’s how it is in NYC), but well-appointed. 
This CQ is right across the street from Grand Central, therefore many different lines of subway super convenient. A Dunkin’ Donuts is also across the street which is great for fast breakfast.

title: Great deal for the money!
text: Close to Grand Central Station. Rooms, although small, well equipped with all you may need. Hotel is clean and modern. Staff are very accommodating. Love the Club Livingroom. Has 24 hour coffee and snacks complimentary. Have used this hotel in the past just for business but beginning to use also for personal trips to NYC.

title: Excellent location!
text: The accommodation is fairly basic.  The location is excellent and Grand Central Station is just a short walk away.  The staff are friendly and efficient.  Not for a luxurious stay but a reasonably comfortable one.

title: Location, location, location
text: I love this property and stay there often.  Not only is it always well-kept with a staff that is always cheerful and helpful, the location (next to Grand Central)  is perfect for getting around the city fast.

title: Nice place to spend some days in NYC
text: This is probably the fourth or the sixth time in here. It’s location is unbeatable, the crew are very helpful and smiley, and the rooms are clean. There rooftop services are great all day long. On the other hand, the cupboard is tiny and there is neither the small refrigerator or a safe.

title: Great Value & Location
text: Super convenient & affordable.  Refillable water bottle stations on each floor & free snacks on 27th floor a nice touch.  Rooms were clean & while not super fancy definitely had all the amenities.  Beds could have been more comfortable & I would have liked better pillows, or at least more than 2. I will definitely stay here again & recommend it to others.

title: Close to the UN
text: Nice hotel in Manhattan, with a very nice room size. Quite practical if you come for the UN as this hotel is walking distance from it. No breakfast but plenty of places around. Very nice view from the rooftop, where you can enjoy a happy hour at the end of the day with a view on the Chrysler building.

title: Excellent stay for a business trip
text: Located close to Grand Central Station in NY makes it an easy to commute. Connecting my Netflix to the TV is an easy way to catch-up with series and movies.Using the app makes it easy to check-in and out.The only aspect that is not my favourite is the breakfast.

title: Convenient location
text: Next to Grand Central so good location if coming into city on commuter train.  Good location near 5th Avenue, Rockefeller Center.  Were attending concert at Madison Square Garden and the walk from hotel was fine even in middle of January.  Loved the cold water stations on each floor and the free food and drink on the top floor.

title: Quatorze nuits parfaites
text: Chambre pas si petite que ça, propreté impeccable, équipement au top, salle de convivialité avec vue sur le Chrysler building et collations très sympas, excellent café, buanderie nickel, personnel sympathique, situation idéale (tout se fait à pied, à condition d'aimer marcher et sinon véritable hub des métros et bus)... bref, quand est-ce que j'y retourne?

title: Great lounge area but poor hygiene in the rooms
text: Loved the living room with the free wifi and snacks. I arrived in the middle of the day and had some work to do, so that was nice... Employees were super friendly and the overall atmosphere was nice. But in all honesty, I wouldn't stay here because the room was tiny and dirty (reason why I used the living room to work). If you are on a budget, this is a good option. But if you are used to business travel at certain level, I wouldn't recommend it.

title: Best hotel I've ever stayed at
text: Incredible hotel in an amazing location.  You are able to walk to several areas of interest.  Included is a washer and dryer on site as well as a gym and clubhouse and room service.  Front desk is amazing.  They were excellent at accomadating me with an early check in and late check out. Love this hotel and now I love NYC.

title: Club Quarters Grand Central
text: The staff here is wonderful and very helpful. I travel and stay here often due to work. It is always a pleasure to see Rey at the desk. He remembers me and the team I travel with and always offers his help with anything we need. He is an asset to the hotel.

title: Top location for a good price
text: The only thing I did not like in the room was the airco that made quite some noise, but it’s definitely not a deal breaker.Top location (super close to Grand Central Station), clean room, good value for money.

title: Concept is good, room dirty
text: HI, I booked this room because in concept it sounded more intereting than the others in this same price category.  Sadly, it was diry...even the hairdryer was disgusting.  it was also quite dark.  The shared area was okay, but certain ameneities needed attention there as well.  I reached out to the hotel and their reply was "sounds like the room needs a deep clean".  I assumed they would be in that day to do it, but when I got back from work late that night, nothing changed...ugh!   The only plus was that they offer filtered water, which again is great in concept, but that area was dingy too.   If they would just scrub the place and add some lights, it could have been a nicer stay.

title: Ok but cleverly advertised
text: Room was smaller than advertised and air con system was joke loud and also only made the room either freezing or boiling. The good thing was having the kitchenette and the location of the hotel was ideal for me so I’d actually stay here again but not because I loved it.

title: great NYC hotel
text: This is a great hotel in a convenient location with great amentities including a roof terrace, snack bar, laundry room and bar. It’s not in the middle of the hustle and bustle but within a comfortable walk of the iconic Grand Central Station which will get you anywhere. Within easy reach walk of Rockerfella Centre, Chrysler building and Time Square.

title: Great place to stay!
text: The hotel rate is reasonable, the rooms are lovely and the staff make you feel like a valued guest.  Plus, it's the little touches that make Club Quarters special, like the yoga mat and resistance bands in the room, free bottles of water available, plus the snacks and wine hour every day!  A great place to stay, highly recommend!

title: Happy Hour with Chris!
text: We actually planned our days to back to the hotel for the Wine hour (5-6) with the hotel host Chris!We will return for a future visit, if Chris is still the Host! Did I mention that Chris is worth the stay!

title: Comfy, Friendly, Convenient Hotel in Midtown
text: This hotel is excellent. I've stayed here twice now. Located a block from Grand Central, it offers easy access to all of NYC, and the staff is super helpful and friendly. The rooms are well-equipped and the beds are comfortable. Oh, and they have a happy hour for guests--need I say more? A special shoutout to one of the people at the desk--Mark Scott, I think his name was. SO welcoming. Thank you!

title: Good place
text: The check in was simple,the room was just a clean well appointed room, priced very fairly. I reserved through a hotel site which got me a discount. I will stay there again when in New York. It’s right across the street from Grand Central. I had a bit of a problem with the tv and called for service and the front desk sent someone up almost instantly.

title: A True Gem!!
text: We stayed at Club Quarters for 3 nights and absolutely loved it! The staff was incredibly kind and welcoming upon our arrival and departure! We were treated with such hospitality and our room was perfectly cozy! We will definitely visit again! Thank you, Club Quarters!

title: Posizione centrale ottima. Terrazza panoramica con Free Wine happy hour, every day 5 to 7pm. Thank you Chris!!!
text: Hoping to come back soon again. Very nice terrace at 27.th floor, Wine party every day. Nice entertainment with CHRIS. Possibility to meet new people. Restaurant included. From Italy with love. Very close to grand central station and subway 4  5 and 6

title: Wonderful experience!!
text: I had never stayed at Club Quarters and was quite pleased with my accommodations. The room was perfect and very clean. The 27th floor terrace had great views and snacks. The staff were amazing, attentive to anything you might need. Great location and would highly recommend. Thanks for a lovely stay!

title: Great Location & Nice Hotel
text:
My husband and child and I very much enjoyed staying at this hotel. The location is great -- it's just a couple of blocks from Grand Central and many sites are within an easy walking distance, including Times Square, Rockefeller Center, and the Empire State Building, depending on how much you like to walk in the city. Of course, there's a subway station at Grand Central, which is nearby. The staff were very friendly and helpful -- especially Jillian and Ashely at check in -- and our room was nice and comfortable, if on the small side. We especially liked the "living room" on the 27th floor, where you can get snacks, coffee & tea, still or bubbly water all day and free wine at 5. The view from up there is terrific. 

Minor complaints: The shower--it was one of those that has a very slight dip from the floor of the bathroom and is not separated from it at all. The drain doesn't do the job of t's keeping water from getting all over the floor and of course the floor mat gets soaked. 

I also wish they had recycling bins in the rooms.

We would definitely stay here again.

title: Overall a great hotel
text:
I stayed here for a short one night stay in December.  I am a fan of Club Quarters pricing and its amenities.  I chose it for its location and glad I stayed here.  

However, I am giving this a 4 stars because I was given a room that someone else smoked in.  I didn't realize it was smoke at the time I checked in and made the mistake of getting comfy.  Since I checked in late, I was tired when I got in and wasn't paying attention to the smell.  I tried to sleep but couldn't because of the stench and had to switch rooms in the middle of the night.  

I ended up sleeping well in my new room but already lost a few hours of sleep due to the room change.  All things considered I would come here again but would make sure my room didn't smell before unwinding.

title: Close to Grand Central
text: Strategic position for subway and on foot in central Manhattan. Confortable hotel and price appropriate at the place. Easy to join and to visit many amazing famous attraction.. time Square MoMa 5th Avenue Rockefeller Centre and so on

title: A Fabulous Hotel in NYC
text:
Our hotel was very near Grand Central Station and convenient to every major Manhattan location! The room was large, stylish and very comfortable, but the best part of our stay was the friendly staff and the level of service that they provided. There was an entire floor dedicated to computers, snacks, coffee and complimentary beverages. What a great little perk and the view from the 27th Floor Lounge was worth a million bucks! 
Fantastic!

title: Great hotel
text: Good location. Very close to subway. The hotel offers lots of facilities. Washer, gym and 24/7 free snacks plus free wine in the evening. They also provide free filtered and chilled water. Worth staying here.

title: Second great stay here
text: Another happy stay at the hotel and the location can't be beat. It is easy to take the stairs to the lobby and the 27th floor snack area is well-stocked and tidy for our enjoyment. The table for work and eating is excellent and my sixth floor room had both a microwave and refrigerator. I did not see a safe in the room, however, and that would have been welcome.

title: Home Away From Home in the City
text: CQ Grand Central is my literal home away from home. I come pretty frequently visit NY for work. I love coming here being greeted with a smile by all of the staff. I come so often that I know several of the staff by name (Rey, Zishan & Michele) A smile and welcome back keeping me coming back time and again and keeps me sharing with friends and coworkers are about this great gem in the city CQ. See you next month CQ!!!!!! Thanks for everything!

title: Clean, convenient and friendly
text: I only stayed one night but was made to feel quite welcome.  The staff were warm and welcoming, especially David during the 5 pm wine time.  He had a great attitude and was friendly with everyone.  The wine was a nice, unexpected treat.  As always, the snacks were plentiful, and there was a good variety.

title: Great value and accomodations
text: Our entire team uses Club Quarters in NYC.  Never disappointed.  Clean, convenient and lovely staff people.  Rooms are equipped for getting work done and also centrally located for getting around.  If you are taking in sites, theater, museums as well, the location is perfect for the subway system.

title: Great hotel on Lexington Av
text: Wonderful hotel , great staff, great location and a wonderful room on the 27 floor and they have wine tasting at 5 or 5:30 can’t remember. Great views of NYC and Lexington Av. Free  filter water on each floor . And free coffee.

title: New York New York
text: The Hotel is well located to all the Hustle and Bustle that NYC has to offer . Grand Central Station is only 3 blocks walk . Outside the Hotel there was shops and eateries all around .For me the Staff were the Highlight of the hotel as well as the 27th floor which is great to use .

title: Great Location and customer service!
text: As soon as we walked in we were greeted by staff and checked in.  Rooms service is on top of things as well. The view from the 27th floor is amazing with complimentary drinks and snacks.Overall great location!

title: Ótimo custo-beneficio
text: Além de bem localizado, o hotel oferece algumas comodidades difíceis de serem encontradas em outros hotéis na região de Manhattan, com este custo. Todos os dias, às 17:00 oferece vinhos tinto e branco, com alguns petiscos para os hospedes. Possui lavanderia, purificadores de água em todos andares e máquina de café.

title: Club Quaters, A Great Place to Stay
text: Club Quarters, Grand Central is convenient location for getting around the city, has great staff and a wonderful lounge area! The hotel is clean, has a fitness room and friendliest staff! They are helpful and even host a Happy Hour.

title: okay room
text: Very, very clean. disappointed in bedding quality, one pillow per person unacceptable. Convenient to the diamond district the room was small, bathroom very small. Water hot and no waits for the elevator.

title: Perfect location
text: No need to take travel iron or hairdryer. Room was small but had everything we needed and was cleaned daily. Staff very friendly. Perfect location for Times Square , Grand Central Station. Complimentary snacks and drinks 24hrs on 24th (?) Floor. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Perfect location, comfy rooms, friendly staff
text: I love the Club Quarters Hotel. The staff is so friendly, check-in and check-out are a breeze, the amenities are terrific, and the rooms are compact but well-designed so you have everything you need. I want to give a special shoutout to David Scott, who checked us in and out--he made us feel like celebrities! Oh, and the location is perfect, right across from Grand Central, so it's easy to get anywhere in NYC from here.

title: We will return!
text: When visiting the city we like to be out and about. The little time spent at the hotel should be pleasant. Club Quarters was excellent in all areas of comfort and service. We'll return in the future when we go to another play, concert, and museum.

title: Great option, convenient for transportation
text:
Stayed here one weekend in April - needed something that is close to a bus stop from Boston, and with easy access to  subway for Upper East Side and Queens. 

Worked really well - it's an urban hotel in Manhattan, so you won't find a giant lobby etc., but staff was very helpful, rooms were well appointed and comfortable. Had breakfast at a diner one block away concierge recommended - was quite happy with the choice too.

title: My first choice hotel for any trip
text: Club Quarters, Grand Central is the perfect hotel for business or personal travel. It is clean, efficient, the staff is friendly and welcoming and always remembers me. It is centrally located and the perfect spot. Chris, at the front desk, is my go to person when I'm there but all of the staff are equally friendly, helpful and accommodating.

title: An amazing end of 2018!
text: Everything was excellent.. The location, near to Grand Central and the most famous NY attractions, the room, small but very clean and comfortable, the staff, very professional and welcoming! I recommend it!

title: Book it you won’t regret it!!!
text: This hotel by far exceeded my expectations.  From the second I arrived to the moment of departure I found the staff to be friendly, welcoming and unbelievably helpful.  My room was clean, spacious and extremely well maintained (the housekeeping team refreshed the room even when I left a note saying not to worry about it!).  There is 24 hour access to WiFi and computers with connected printer at no additional cost, the filtered water on each floor with empty bottles to refill was a welcomed feature.  Not to mention the 5-6 wine happy hour which was an unexpected bonus and let’s just say they weren’t shy in acquainting themselves with our wine glasses!!! The hotel itself is amazingly placed for access to the city’s sights and attractions and became our comfortable central hub when out and about in this amazing city.  There are numerous eateries and supermarket delis to suit any budget in very close proximity to the hotel should you want to eat out at all during your stay but the hotels restaurant is lovely so you may not need to consider these at all.  The value for money considering all these points was quite extraordinary and I will definitely be back later in the year.  Go ahead and book this fabulous hotel for your NYC stay, I guarantee you won’t regret it.

title: Friendly staff; extra perks
text: This hotel was a pleasure for our recent stay in NYC.  Staff was all friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. This hotel offers a bunch of extra touches such as water stations on every floor with refillable water bottles, snacks throughout the day, and free wine Between 5-6pm. Overall it was a great stay at a very reasonable price.

title: I LOVE this hotel
text: We were on a family trip at Christmas time. Family coming into the city from UK, Connecticut, Upstate. This was the perfect location for us. The hotel is immaculate, the 27th floor is fun gathering place. The staff is fantastic, especially with weird requests like keeping sausages in their deep freeze!!  It has everything I need in a hotel. I have also stayed at the WTC Club quarters, which is also fantastic. Why stay anywhere else?

title: Good but expensive
text: Nice location in NYveru good staff, Chris is very nice27th floor is a comfortable lounge with free drinks and foodRent a room in NY is very expensiveclose to metro station and very easy to get a taxi to go to airport

title: Best staff ever
text: The staff here at this hotel is amazing. Most helpful and accommodating staff at any hotel I’ve ever visited. I travel for a living with my work so that says a lot.  Thank you Liz and Rey for all your help with any needs we had.

title: Nice hotel
text:
Nice comfortable hotel in a good location. Only issue was at check in I was asked for my credit card and handed my rooms keys. When I checked my bank account once in my room I noticed I was charged €221 more than what my booking stated. I returned to reception to enquire the receptionist told me some was a security deposit which i had no problem with but I was never told upon check in and he could not explain why I was charged a further €100. I asked to speak to the manager and he informed me he was the manager but he couldn’t do anything and he told me to ring the booking agent myself to sort it. Had to deal with this for the holiday until it was sorted which was stressful and expensive to make calls.
Other than that hotel is lovely, most staff very friendly and helpful

title: Fantastisk belliggenhed men dårlig service
text:
Hotellets beliggenhed er helt fantastisk og findes næsten ikke bedre, da det ligger i en sidegade til Grand Central. 
Selve hotelværelset er meget lille og virker nedslidt, men værelset har de ting, som man har behov for. Oppe på tagterrassen er der gratis kaffe og snacks og billig vin om aftenen, hvilket vi benyttede os en del af. Der er ligeledes gratis vand på flaske på hver etage.
Vi oplevede en meget dårlig service, da vi adskillede gange klagede over at vores nabo røg hash, hvilket gik i vores ventilationsanlæg og gjorde at vores værelse stank! Personalet var ude af stand til at handle på vores klage, og forklarede deres manglende handling med at de ikke måtte gå ind på værelset, når der stod: "Do not disturb". Dette er uacceptabelt, når man betaler over 10.000 kr. for et hotel i en uge. Hvis servicen havde været bedre, så havde de fået 4 stjerner.

title: consistent product every time!
text: my company uses CQ at a few locations always a consistent product ... i like the included snack room and the staff is always friendly and accommodating to my needs... I highly recommend staying that the mid town Manhattan location

title: Discreto
text: L’hotel ha una posizione veramente ottimale , vicinissimo al Grand Central terminal e Time square; nei dintorni bar e ristoranti. Ovviamente essendo in centro c’è anche un po’ di caos se ti trovi ai piani bassi (compreso il rumore della metropolitana) , ma tutto abbastanza accettabile. Manca totalmente di una hall al piano terra , ma il tutto è sopperito dal 27imo piano : vista bellissima sui grattacieli, bevande calde e fredde quasi ad ogni ora , con qualche stuzzichino ; simpaticissimo uno dei ragazzi dell’albergo che ride e scherza con tutti ! Personale giovane e cordiale. Pulizia buona . camera un po’ piccolina, un po’ da rinnovare negli arredi : armadio molto piccolo , nessuna cassaforte in camera; nel bagno c’è una doccia ampia, alla quale però metterei un bel vetro : un hotel a 4 stelle cn la tenda da doccia non ci può essere! In complesso , comunque m una buona scelta !

title: NYC Hotel
text: Club Quarters Grand Central is a relatively new property and is in a great location with easy access to both Grand Central and Travelers office on Lexington Avenue.  Rooms are small but price point is usually good for the city.

title: Very suitable for Business travel
text: The room was very small but sufficient for one Person. I appreciated the yoga mat and the exercises offered on screen but some of the exercises were a challenge because of the very limited space. The bathroom was very clean and well equipped. Decoration was nice.

title: Four near five
text: 5  Stars for staff.  5 stars for location.  4.5 for condition (a little frayed here and there).  5 stars for 27th floor terrace view/space with chairs and tables.  5 stars for water bottles, snacks and cleanliness.  4 stars for size (it is NYC) and while we paid for a kitchenette it is not as photographed:  cup-size microwave, dorm-size fridge and coffee pod.  If that's satisfactory, then go for it.  It is quiet, the bathroom was plenty, and -- again -- outstanding staff.

title: Needed $ effective near Grand Central
text: We arrived at 1:30 am.  Desk person was very helpful even though he couldn't check us in immediately because system was doing its overnight run.  Asked where I could get some pizza and he walked me outside and pointed me in the right direction.  By the time I returned he had me checked in and ready to go.

title: Fantastic Stay
text: Great location, clean rooms, friendly staff and a great happy hour with Chris every evening. We upgraded to a suite which had a queen bed and very comfortable pull out couch. Shower and bathroom were clean with complimentary shampoo, conditioner and body lotion. Highly recommended!

title: Hollydays in New York
text: Surprise. The staff was great!  Only the rooms are small but very confortables. Special mention to the 27th floor. I’ll come back to this hotel next time for shure. The situation is perfect in front Gran Central!

title: Localização primorosa!
text: O hotel é excelente! O quarto e o banheiro são extremamente limpos e silenciosos, com boa qualidade de colchão, roupa de cama, travesseiros e toalhas. A climatização funcionou perfeitamente bem! Televisão smart e internet wifi muito rápida e estável!A localização é fantástica, em Midtown, perto de tudo!O ponto forte, além disso tudo, é a equipe. Especialmente Chris e Ashley, que foram muito simpáticos e prestativos. O hotel oferece água, lanchinhos e uma máquina de café excelente, tudo gratuito! E ainda tem o "Wine at 5", ou seja, o vinho às 17h, servido gratuitamente, todos os dias, no rooftop do hotel!Excelente experiência! Recomendo fortemente!!Antes que eu me esqueça, precisamos de um early check-in e fomos atendidos, sem nenhum custo, isso em plena semana do Natal!

title: Excellent time at Club Quarters
text: Customer service - ExcellentRoom - Clean, functional, comfortable- has everything you need. Hotel - wonderful lounge and business meeting areasLocation - perfect!Well appointed, modern and chic. You will love it.

title: New Years in NYC
text: We stayed 30th Dec to 2nd Jan and the hotel is perfect - amazing location literally 10 minute walk from Times Square, and we were blown away by the service - Chris who we met at the 5-6pm free wine service on the 27th floor was an incredible host and created a fab atmosphere, if I could give him a 6th star on this I would! Highly recommend this hotel and thank you to Chris he made our evening on New Years Day. Happy New Year!

title: Très bonne situation
text:
Hôtel très bien situé proche des principales attractions de midtown et bien desservi par le métro.
Chambre de taille très correcte avec literie confortable.
Seul bémol, le bruit lorsqu’un voisin rentre dans sa chambre et claque la porte, cela nous a réveillé à plusieurs reprises mais autrement nous n’entendions pas nos voisins.
Chambre au 23 e étage avec vue sur le chrysler building.
